programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts Debbie and Tony Parkes have been married for 40 years, and are ready for a new chapter in their lives. With retirement around the corner, they've set their hearts on a holiday home in Albufeira on Portugal's Algarve with a budget of £80,000.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Danni Menzies shows a number of properties to Robin and Susan Loxton from Suffolk, who want to buy a holiday home around the area of Mijas, their favourite part of southern Spain.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin shows sun-worshippers Carol and Junior Smith from Middlesex five properties on Spain's popular Mar Menor in the hope one will meet their approval.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman helps mother and daughter Rhona Brennan and Nina find the perfect family holiday home that could also work as a B&B in the French region of Limousin.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: After 30 years of marriage and a life dedicated to their family, Simon and Mary Loyne feel the time has arrived to focus on themselves. They have sold their Cheshire home and cannot wait to move to Spain's Costa Almeria. Danni Menzies shows them five fabulous properties for their budget of £100,000, but do they go for a townhouse with a man cave Simon really wants or an apartment close to the beach, in Mary's perfect location?.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads for the Grasshopper Also in Carlstadt, New Jersey, a family-owned Irish restaurant. There, he lends a helping hand to Mitch Sandler, who has been struggling to live up to the expectations of his father-in-law since he invested heavily in the business. The chef also tries to improve the presentation of dishes emerging from the kitchen.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads for Boston to help change the fortunes of a failing Italian restaurant run by two brothers. The eatery's decline began when one of the pair started embezzling money to fund his prescription drug addiction, and things only got worse when the he was sentenced to four years in prison. With the time now served, he has returned, but must first regain his brother's trust before he can save their business.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads for Bridgeport, Connecticut, to visit Cafe Tavolini, which is being neglected by husband and wife managers teetering on the edge of divorce. The estranged couple's two children are struggling to save the business from their parents' disputes, and the visiting chef tries to shock the pair into stopping the restaurant from becoming a casualty of their quarrel.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin shows sun-worshippers Carol and Junior Smith from Middlesex five properties on Spain's popular Mar Menor in the hope one will meet their approval.(n)

programme.desc: Danni Menzies shows a number of properties to Robin and Susan Loxton from Suffolk, who want to buy a holiday home around the area of Mijas, their favourite part of southern Spain.(n)

programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts Debbie and Tony Parkes have been married for 40 years, and are ready for a new chapter in their lives. With retirement around the corner, they've set their hearts on a holiday home in Albufeira on Portugal's Algarve with a budget of £80,000.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp helps Jacinta and Marco, who have outgrown their home in Didsbury, Greater Manchester, while Phil Spencer assists newly engaged Olivia and Amy, who want to settle back in the North after five years on the move.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: An 80-year-old patient is admitted suffering from pain in her chest, arm and jaw, and consultant Sarah is concerned that Joan's heart is struggling and requests an urgent blood test and heart. Meanwhile a 26-year-old woman who fell and hit her head during a hen party in Ibiza complains about headaches, dizziness and vomiting, with doctors fearing she may have caused serious damage.(n)

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency
programme.desc: Following the criminalisation of formerly legal highs, crack and heroin use is on the up in Wiltshire - and some of the users seem to be getting younger and a routine stop and search uncovers a bag of crack cocaine in the possession of a boy still in his teens. Meanwhile, PC Luke Hobbs leads his first drugs raid on a suspected heroin and crack supplier in Swindon's city centre, discovering the property has been commandeered by a dealer from London who is using the address as a base to make a move into the local market.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: In the first of a two-part edition, Gordon Ramsay heads to La Galleria 33 in Boston, Massachusetts, an Italian restaurant run by sisters Rita and Lisa. The pair grew up working at their father's eatery nearby, but when they opened their own business, they couldn't replicate his success, and they now blame their failure on everything from the weather to the tablecloths.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Croydon mates Josh and Jack take part in a double date, but problems arise after they meet Morgan and Jasmine, and both fall for the same girl. Meanwhile, divorced mum-of-two Sandy hopes to find romance with an astrology expert Steve, though incompatible star signs may be a problem. And tomboy boat-builder Abbey returns to the restaurant, but will she find a soul mate in Eddie, an odd job man who's nervous around women?.(n)

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: The dads are under the spotlight at Liverpool Women's Hospital as three very different men prepare for fatherhood. Midwife Kirsty looks after Rebecca and Jack, a soldier who's more confident about going into battle than he is about changing nappies. Mum Billie arrives with her ex-partner Nathan, and although they're apart, they hope they can raise their child together. Cameras also follow John, who has always wanted to be a dad. He hopes some of his broodiness will rub off on girlfriend Natalie.(n)

programme.title: Real, Fake or Unknown
programme.desc: Trying to prove the authenticity of the internet's most famous clips, including a futuristic head shave, the world's most idiotic selfie and a city in the sky. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: The founder and president of the Tilted Kilt Pub & Eatery chain of sports bars hopes to see how his staff operate by posing as a failed business owner taking part in a bogus reality TV show. Ron Lynch goes undercover to make sure his company's principles are being implemented by his corporate and kitchen staff alike.(n)

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker are joined by Aisling Bea for a comic review of the significant moments of the past seven days. The trio offer their own unique insight into some of the most difficult and delicate issues in modern Britain, and answer that most important of questions: Is it OK?.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: A teenage girl passes through the doors of Prestige Pawnbrokers, seeking to sell her grandfather's designer watch in an effort to fund her fledgling jewellery business. History expert Lawrence is delighted when he is presented with an autographed 1960s racing programme, and an online customer is shocked by the valuation received by her collection of luxury items. Plus, boss James Constantinou ends up crashing a converted double-decker bus when he takes it for a test drive.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: An international deal for James Constantinou on a wine collection in Lanzarote may be worth a million Euros, and a couple look to sell their one-of-a-kind house boat. Elsewhere, a gastro pub owner wants to take a loan out against a £250,000 Bentley, and James considers a risky deal on an unusual giant gemstone. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help two first-time buyers, beginning with Ian Harker, a vicar about to retire who wants to remain in east London with his wife. They then focus their efforts on businesswoman Shazia Awan, who has built a successful lingerie business and is looking forward to expanding her opportunities by moving from south Wales to London.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Andy Wiederhorn, CEO of Los Angeles-based fast food restaurant Fatburger, goes incognito among his employees in order to learn more about his business that has evolved from a late-night hangout for musicians in the 1950s to an international success story.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads for Boston to help change the fortunes of a failing Italian restaurant run by two brothers. The eatery's decline began when one of the pair started embezzling money to fund his prescription drug addiction, and things only got worse when the he was sentenced to four years in prison. With the time now served, he has returned, but must first regain his brother's trust before he can save their business.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The first visit of the week is to Newton House in Knaresborough, North Yorkshire, where Denise Carter and Jackie Fennell's traditional B&B focuses on organic, free-range breakfasts. Over dinner, guest Marianne Cammack and Deina Thomas from dominate the conversation, riling up some of the others, while Mike Hayes and Neal Widdowson think the morning meal is all way too fancy.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Council manager Charlotte hosts the first dinner party in Llanelli, Carmarthenshire, where she hopes to impress electrician Steve, occupational nurse Christine, retired French teacher Meic, and teaching assistant Ainsley with an evening that features a former rugby choir as entertainment.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Electrician Steve hosts the second night of the competition in Llanelli, Carmarthenshire, and hopes that his menu of lasagne, vegetable soup and homemade wine will impress his guests and win him the £1,000 prize. As the evening goes on, Meic decides to bare all with a revelation that shocks Christine.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Occupational nurse Christine hosts the third dinner party in Llanelli, where she tries to impress her guests with a menu of family favourites and a performance by her number one rock band. Charlotte and Meic stumble across the host's messy office, and trouble brews when Ainsley tells Christine that she looks like one of her exes.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Retired French teacher Meic hosts the fourth night of the competition in Llanelli, Carmarthenshire, and plans an authentic French menu including poulet Basquaise. Fellow diner Charlotte makes an impression when she arrives wearing an onion necklace, and the host hopes that his specially branded cremes brulees will impress his guests.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It is the final day of the competition in Llanelli, and the turn of teaching assistant Ainsley to host. She wants to educate her guests, while serving an authentic Russian-themed dinner party. However, vodka-infused pavlova and some dancing may not be enough to offset the cantankerous mood at the dinner table.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer revisit two sets of house-hunters. In North Yorkshire, they catch up with Trudi and Steve who relocated from Edinburgh to be nearer their relatives, and in Luton, Bedfordshire, the experts find out whether community artist Zena has been able to move out of her parents' home and get onto the property ladder.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location

Newly engaged accountants Liz and Neil are hoping to raise a family near the town of Tring, while in St Albans, married couple David and Claire want to find a place where they can finally settle down, after moving house five times in five years.(n)

programme.title: Diana: In Her Own Words
programme.desc: Documentary featuring never-before-seen footage of Diana, Princess of Wales, recorded by her speech consultant between 1992 and 1993 as she sought to define her public persona and present her own version of events reported in the press, touching on her marriage and experience of public life. The programme also features in-depth interviews with people close to her.(n)

programme.title: The Mystery of the Crossrail Skulls
programme.desc: Documentary examining the discovery of dozens of Roman-era skulls by engineers working beneath London's Liverpool Street station. The remains have been identified as dating back to Roman times, but it has yet to be determined who these people were and how their heads ended up buried on the site. Archaeologists examine the bones for evidence of the various theories that have been suggested, questioning whether the skulls belonged to gladiators, executed rebels or the victims of a massacre, or formed part of a grisly ritual.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Claire is delighted to learn Junior altered an algebra report to make Janet and Michael think he achieved an A instead of an F, and immediately sets out to blackmail him. Comedy, starring Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Junior's family rallies round to help him deal with a school bully, but only succeed in making matters worse. Meanwhile, baby Kady develops a strange new habit.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Janet urges Michael to stop watching so much TV and spend a little more time with the family, but he is glued to a basketball game and does not pay any attention. Later the roles are reversed, making them realise they have a communication problem.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael and Jay grow concerned about the amount of time Junior is spending in the bathroom and Claire brings home her first boyfriend - only for her father to monopolise him. Comedy, starring Damon Wayans and Tisha Campbell-Martin.(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael fears his relationship with Janet has lost its spark when his brother arrives with a beautiful new girlfriend. Meanwhile, Claire tries to win a dance contest - but her routine does little to impress her father.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: Highlights of the residents' past 24 hours under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, as they try to get used to their housemates' quirks and foibles while also coping with the day-to-day complications of life inside the house.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Officers chase £4,500 in court fees in North Wales after a property deal turned sour, and in Birmingham the agents try to collect over £3,500 from a single mum who defaulted on loan repayments. Elsewhere in Worcestershire, the enforcement agents try to recover more than £10,000 from a shop-keeper for fraudulently keeping a deposit during a property sale.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: In Staffordshire agents try to collect nearly £2,500 in unpaid parking fines, while officers Matt and Garry head to the West Midlands to recover £4,500 owed from a debtor to his former girlfriend. Elsewhere, agents travel to south east London looking to collect £3,000 owed by a taxi company.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: In South East London, officers Gary and Cona chase a debt of nearly £50,000 in unpaid rent, leading to a feisty confrontation with the debtor. Elsewhere, agents Gary and Paul try to recover over £2,000 owed by a teenager to a local garage in Kent, and officers Max and Paul head to South West London on the trail of a film producer who owes £8,000 to financial advisers.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Documentary series giving an insight into the world of debt collection from the perspectives of debtors, creditors and those who collect the payments. Brian and Graham have been warned to expect trouble as they evict some tenants from a south London flat, one of whom has a reputation for violence. Everything goes smoothly until the enforcement agents make a shocking discovery in a child's bedroom. Paul and Steve head to Slough to collect wages owed to a freelance worker, but the debtor is less than happy to find the high-court enforcement officers on his doorstep and things get physical.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits and 40 Grand in Debt.
programme.desc: Documentary telling the stories of people struggling to live on state welfare, focusing on some who have found themselves in serious debt.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: And a Baby on the Way.
programme.desc: The documentary series meets three mothers trying to raise their children on benefits. Amy recently moved to the Isle of Wight with her partner to be close to his family, only to end up living alone with her two children. Single mum Natasha from Camberley is expecting her second child and struggles to get by, often missing meals so she can afford to feed her 16-month-old son, while Essex mum Becky receives £450 per month and enjoys a life beyond her means, typically spending £500 on her daughter at Christmas.(n)

programme.title: Named and Shamed: Greatest Celebrity Scandals
programme.desc: A rundown of the most salacious celebrity scandals to shock the worlds of pop, film, television and sport. This documentary relives some of the most stunning star slip-ups, with interviews from professional observers, and nostalgic archive footage. Among the mishaps revisited are Hugh Grant's ill-advised detour on Hollywood Boulevard and Cheryl's infamous bust-up in a nightclub toilet.(n)

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: A teenager grows up in a strictly ordered future society where people's lives are decided according to personality types. She discovers she does not fit into any of the existing categories, and must fight against a conspiracy to wipe out all those like her. Sci-fi adventure based on the book series by Veronica Roth, starring Shailene Woodley and Kate Winslet.(n)

programme.desc: In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin -- a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago(n)

programme.title: Sgt. Bilko
programme.desc: A conniving army sergeant pulls numerous cons while feuding with one of his former victims who attempts to get him kicked out of the service(n)

programme.title: Tron
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller in which a young computer genius is sucked into a master computer system while trying to hack into it to prove that his ideas for video games are being stolen. He and his henchman, the electronic warrior Tron, face many trials and finally have to battle for their lives with the computer itself(n)

programme.title: The Cotton Club
programme.desc: In 1920s New York, gangsters rub shoulders with celebrities at Harlem's Cotton Club. A jazz musician falls for a mobster's moll and a black dancer pursues a mixed race chorus girl, but racial and legal divides keep them apart(n)

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Hayden Christensen puts down his light saber to deliver a fine performance in this engrossing, fact-based tale of journalist Stephen Glass, whose up-and-coming career came to a screeching halt when it was discovered that he fabricated stories. Peter Sarsgaard, Chloe Sevigny, Rosario Dawson, Hank Azaria(n)

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Eerie saga about a rare-book buyer who becomes a target of unknown forces when he's asked to find a volume about the Devil(n)

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: Set in the Depression of the '30s in southern United States, this drama portrays the remarkable relationship established between Paul Edgecomb (Tom Hanks), a prison guard on Death Row, and John Coffey (Michael Clarke Duncan), a hefty colored man sentenced to death for a brutal double homicide. As the days go by, and after some surprising experiences, Edgecomb begins to have doubts about Coffey's culpability. He is a naïve, apprehensive man with a supernatural gift. Based on a novel by Stephen King, this drama received four Oscar nominations(n)

programme.title: Suffragette
programme.desc: A working-class laundress in 19th-century London becomes radicalised when she meets a brave cadre of women who are fighting for the right to vote(n)

programme.title: Hoosiers
programme.desc: Hoosiers tells the true story of a group of underdogs who become champions. Set in the 1950s, Hoosiers is about a hard-luck, unemployed college basketball coach (Gene Hackman) who gets a chance to coach a small-town Indiana high-school basketball team. Facing resentment from the community and the team itself, Hackman manages to inspire his young athletes, leading them to the state championship with the help of the assistant coach (Dennis Hopper), who happens to be a recovering alcoholic(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: An exploration of human survival and the ability of fate to alter even the tidiest of lives with one major event, Cast Away tells the story of Chuck Noland (Tom Hanks), a Federal Express engineer who devotes most of his life to his troubleshooting job. His girlfriend Kelly (Helen Hunt) is often neglected by his dedication to work, and his compulsive personality suggests a conflicted man. But on Christmas Eve, Chuck proposes marriage to Kelly right before embarking on a large assignment. On the assignment, a plane crash strands Chuck on a remote island, and his fast-paced life is slowed to a crawl, as he is miles removed from any human contact. Finding solace only in a volleyball that he befriends, Chuck must now learn to endure the emotional and physical stress of his new life, unsure of when he may return to the civilization he knew before. Cast Away reunites star Hanks with director Robert Zemeckis, their first film together since 1994's Oscar-winning Forrest Gump(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Toula and Ian are parents to a teenage daughter in this sequel that brings the entire Portokalos family together for another huge wedding(n)

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: Biopic of entrepreneur Joy Mangano, a divorced mother of two who risks her life's savings to produce and market her invention, the Miracle Mop. The success of that product leads to a home-shopping empire and her ascension to matriarch of her family(n)

programme.title: To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar
programme.desc: Drag queens Vida, Noxeema and Chi Chi win a trip to Hollywood. But on their cross-country road trip, they're stranded in a small town where they fall foul of the local redneck cop, give out free fashion advice and help battered wife Carol Ann(n)

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Four years after they left school, three old pals team up for a road trip from Georgia to California. Mimi's got dreams of Hollywood, Kit's looking forward to seeing her beau, but Lucy wants escape...and maybe to find the mother she's never met(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: When meek Eilis Lacey (Saoirse Ronan) emigrates from Ireland to New York City, her heart is soon torn between a magnetic Italian neighbor (Emory Cohen) and a charming lad (Domhnall Gleeson) back home(n)

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: Richard Pryor stars as Montgomery Brewster, a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300m. But there's a catch he has to waste $30m in just 30 days without anyone knowing he's doing it, without investing it and without banking it. And his best friend John Candy is no help, trying to make his friend's money earn interest... Walter Hill, better known for tough dramas, turns his hand to comedy for this much-loved and filmed stage play, scripted in this case by Timothy Harris and Herschel Weingrod of Trading Places fame(n)

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: An ancient assassin attempts to trounce an evil conqueror by teaming up with a coalition of the remaining "free tribes" surviving under tyrannical rule(n)

programme.title: Heartbreak Ridge
programme.desc: Hard-nosed army sergeant Tom Highway battles rebellious recruits and his own strait-laced superiors in the build-up to America's invasion of Grenada(n)

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biopic spanning a twenty-year period in the life of eccentric millionaire Howard Hughes, including the films, the women and his pioneering success as a world-class aviator. Visually stunning drama(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Courtroom drama in which two US marines who fought together in war are reunited in a battle against the military. When one of the men is threatened with court martial for his involvement in the death of 83 civilians, he calls on his former colleague, who is embittered by his Vietnam injuries, to act as his attorney. As the men seek revenge against the military system, a high-level political conspiracy unravels(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: This crime drama based on true events follows the rise and fall of South Boston gangster James "Whitey" Bulger, who was convinced by an FBI agent to act as an informant against the Italian mob. With his main competition out of the way, Bulger assumes power and becomes a feared crime boss(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Epic romantic adventure, set just prior to World War II, about an English aristocrat and the rugged drover who helps her with the cattle station she inherited(n)

programme.title: Winter's Tale
programme.desc: In early-20th century New York, a thief falls for a dying heiress, but he is being pursued by a vengeful enemy(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Dance Night Obsession
programme.desc: A professional dancer on a popular TV competition is murdered and one of her colleagues seems to have a mysterious stalker who is intent on forcing her off the show, but it soon becomes clear the killer wants her dead too. Thriller, starring Sabrina Bryan.(n)

programme.title: Eyewitness
programme.desc: After her testimony sent him to jail, a woman finds herself held captive in her own home when the man who murdered her father and fiancee escapes from prison to confront her. Thriller, starring Lindy Booth, Craig Olejnik and Jon McLaren.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Etude in Black
programme.desc: An orchestra conductor murders his mistress for threatening to reveal their affair, and makes her death look like suicide. However, he reckons without the intervention of crumpled cop Columbo, who sees through the subterfuge and determines to get to the truth. Detective drama, starring Peter Falk, John Cassavetes, Myrna Loy and Blythe Danner.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: A Matter of Honour
programme.desc: The sleuth's holiday in Mexico is disrupted by a bizarre death involving a suave retired bullfighter, who has killed his best friend using one of the animals as a murder weapon - but is determined his spotless image and reputation will remain untarnished. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Ricardo Montalban, A Martinez and Pedro Armendariz Jr.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Any Old Port in a Storm
programme.desc: A vineyard owner's financial security is jeopardised when his playboy younger brother threatens to sell the family winery. He resorts to killing his sibling and rigging the death scene to look like a scuba-diving accident. However, the crumpled cop sees through the ruse and in the process reveals he is something of a wine buff himself. Detective drama, with Peter Falk, Donald Pleasence and Julie Harris.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Don Lambert, an accountant who offered to testify against weapons trafficker Hugo Garza, dies after slipping away from the Federal Marshals tasked with keeping him safe ahead of the trial. In an attempt to ensure justice is done, Pride offers to personally escort a replacement witness - Lambert's former business partner - to the trial in Texas. However, the killer is still out there, and it's not long before Pride, Sonja and their witness face an ambush. Naval crime drama, starring Scott Bakula.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: A power cut plunges most of the city into darkness, and Pride is approached by his daughter's best friend, Frankie, who claims to have received an unnerving message from her fiance Nick, who has gone missing. Using background noise from his message, the team deduces Nick's location, but finds he has been killed. A chain of evidence leads to an abandoned house containing blueprints for New Orleans' electric grids, as well as the murder weapon, and as Pride and his colleagues investigate further, they begin to suspect Nick's death and the blackout are connected to an opportunistic gang planning to use the power cut as a cover for a looting spree. However, there is more to the case than meets the eye. Crime drama, starring Scott Bakula.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A naval technology scientist is being rushed to hospital with a gunshot wound, only for an unknown assailant to stop the ambulance and finish the job there and then, while also killing everyone else on board. The investigation takes an intriguing turn when the post-mortem reveals an object was removed from the victim's chest, and even more so when an unlikely link emerges between the dead man and a surfer, giving Deeks and Kensi the chance to pull on their wetsuits and head down to the beach. Eric Christian Olsen and Daniela Ruah star.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac is found at the harbour in Jersey City, having escaped from a sinking car, but he is suffering from concussion and can recall only scant details of his kidnapping. However, the team resolves to track down his abductor and believes CCTV footage of the suspect driving through a toll barrier in another vehicle is just the lead required. Starring Gary Sinise.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team embarks on a desperate search to find the source of a radioactive substance that claimed a woman's life at a concert and hospitalised Sid, who was exposed to it while examining the body. Evidence leads them to the antiquities section of the New York library - and the finger of suspicion points to a former employee who bore a grudge. Guest starring Maroon 5.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A violent sexual assault on a boy draws Benson and Stabler into a culture clash between Orthodox Jews and the secular authorities - but the investigation ultimately leads them to a 14-year-old with a penchant for preying on younger children. Starring Christopher Meloni.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A number of fertilised embryos are stolen from a sperm bank and the team's investigation reveals several unhappy customers - as well as a couple of outspoken anti-fertility activists who liken such clinics to death camps. Before long, Benson and Stabler have their suspects in custody - but a shocking turn of events at the courthouse turns the case into a murder. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson goes undercover in a prison to investigate a teenage girl's claims that a guard raped her and has been threatening her jailed mother. Posing as an inmate, she tries to find evidence that systematic abuse is taking place - and faces a terrifying ordeal in the basement of the facility. Starring Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investment banker is found dead and suspicion falls on his boyfriend, a professional American football player desperate to keep his sexuality a secret. However, details of the case later appear in the media, calling Benson's relationship with the Press into question. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hargitay and Christopher Meloni, with Bill Pullman (Torchwood).(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler are drawn into a series of psychological games by Merritt Rook (guest star Robin Williams), an engineer whose obsessive hatred of authority proves popular with the public and wins him a cult following. Hard-hitting drama, with Christopher Meloni.(n)

programme.title: Catch a Contractor
programme.desc: Adam Carolla, builder Skip Bedell and his wife, private investigator Alison Bedell, seek justice for homeowners. In the first episode, they meet members of a family forced to sleep on their living room floor after a builder rips their home apart and deserts the project. The team tries to track down the contractor and make him return to the scene of the crime to repair the damage.(n)

Elsewhere, Maryellen gets to know John better, but her fears about his past are not completely allayed when he turns down the offer of an interview.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis trace a robbery suspect to a militia group, but McCoy is strangely affected by the leader's devotion to his cause - and begins to receive death threats once the case comes to court. Award-winning police drama, starring Benjamin Bratt and Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives Munch and Falsone head for pastures new, travelling to New York to aid the investigation into the death of a teenage model, while McCoy has a fight on his hands with the attorney representing the victim's parents. Award-winning police drama, guest starring Richard Belzer and Jon Seda, with Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY

The prime suspect turns out to be a rival who was competing with the victim for a sponsorship deal, but finding him is no easy matter. Meanwhile, Stella tells Mac she thinks she is being stalked. Forensic drama, starring Gary Sinister, Eddie Cahill and Melina Kanakaredes.(n)

Mystery, starring Andie MacDowell, Daniel Sunjata and Annabeth Gish.(n)

programme.desc: McGee feels the pressure as the team investigates a double murder that appears to be inspired by his still unpublished new novel. His sense of guilt is compounded by the realisation that one of his colleagues could become the killer's third target. American drama following the work of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service, starring Sean Murray and Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate when a student is shot dead after a party gets out of control. The victim's boyfriend is arrested, but the officers later receive a tip-off about someone else - a vengeful youth deliberately infecting girls with HIV. Drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate an attack on a nurse, and discover she had been moving house regularly in an effort to evade a stalker who terrorised her with distressing e-mails. The victim regains consciousness, but fails to identify her attacker, leading to the shocking revelation that she may have fabricated the assault story as a way of attracting attention.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and the team are called to a deaf family's home, where a woman has been shot and killed - a case that brings up memories of Lindsay's troubled past. Meanwhile, Stella and Danny investigate the murder of a promising figure-skater who has been found dead at the ice rink - and come to suspect she was not the intended target. Gary Sinise, Melina Kanakaredes and Anna Belknap star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A blind man unwittingly photographs evidence of a murder, leading Jethro and the team to the corpse of a petty officer who was stabbed with a knife left at the scene. Further evidence indicates his death was not the result of a random mugging - but cracking the case proves difficult. Meanwhile, Tony has relationship problems. Drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is made acting director while Jenny is attending an overseas conference. However, he decides to ignore his duties and investigate the murder of a man who arrived dead in a taxi at the team's headquarters with no clues to his identity - except a mysterious list of names. Drama, starring Mark Harmon and Sean Murray.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A millionaire former CIA man meets a premature end when someone plants a controlled explosive in his lighter. Over the years he had built up an impressive list of enemies, so finding his killer looks like an uphill task, but as the agents start working through the potential culprits, a recovered computer file leads them to an escort service used by a wanted hitman. However, what they don't bank on is the chief suspect turning up dead.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The body of a pregnant woman is found in a burnt-out building, triggering an investigation that leads the team to suspect a wealthy coffee trader and his son may be responsible. The case eventually goes to court, but a mistrial is declared - to the dismay of Novak, who vows to fight on regardless.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Chester Lake is suspected of murdering a police officer, and Fin's investigation into his history reveals he has been working with a freelance team solving cold cases. Drama, starring Adam Beach, Ice-T and Christopher Meloni.(n)

programme.title: Pocahontas
programme.desc: Set in 1607, it tells of the beautiful, brave and compassionate daughter of Chief Powhatan who speaks to her forest friends (Meeko the raccoon, Flit the hummingbird and Grandmother Willow, a 400 year old spirit that resides in an ancient tree) for advice. It tells how her life changes when she meets John Smith, one of a party of sailors which has come to the New World searching for gold. The powerful and moving story of a Native American princess and her ill-fated love for an English sea captain, Pocahontas is a stunning piece of state of the art animation. Pocahontas teaches him the true value of life, and how every rock tree and creature has a living spirit. She saves him from execution by her people, and he in turn saves Powahatan but is wounded. Eventually they are forced to part, but their spirits remain entwined. This beautiful and moving story, enhanced by a superb soundtrack, make Disney's 33rd animated feature film an unmissable gem(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: The supernatural tale of star-crossed lovers continues as the Cullen family flees Forks in order to protect Bella (Kristen Stewart), and the heartbroken high-school senior discovers that vampires aren't the only creatures in town. Realizing that Bella will never be safe as long as he's around, Edward (Robert Pattinson) makes the difficult decision to leave his beloved behind shortly after her 18th birthday. Reeling from her loss, Bella embraces self-destruction after being comforted by Edward's image during a moment of mortal peril. But as heavy-hearted as Bella may be, her old friend Jacob (Taylor Lautner) distracts her from her sorrows by helping her renovate a weather-beaten motorbike. When Bella encounters a former adversary with a sizable grudge, she's rescued from harm at the last second by pack of enormous, ferocious wolves. Subsequently delving into the history of the Quileutes, Bella discovers the secrets of Jacob's tribe while looking forward to a reunion with Edward that may have deadly consequences(n)

programme.title: Canvas
programme.desc: Mental illness stretches a loving family to the breaking point in this independent drama. Chris Marino (Devon Gearhart) is a ten-year-old boy growing up in a small oceanside community in Florida. Chris's father John (Joe Pantoliano) is a construction worker who is struggling to hold the family together under difficult circumstances -- his wife and Chris' mother, Mary (Marcia Gay Harden), has been diagnosed with schizophrenia, and while they've been pursuing a variety of treatment options, Mary's condition continues to slowly deteriorate as she hears phantom sounds, has hallucinations, and becomes increasingly paranoid. While Joe tries to explain Mary's disease to Chris, her actions have turned her into an increasingly frightening and embarrassing stranger to her son, and Mary is clearly aware of the toll her condition has taken on the family but cannot help herself. After a violent incident results in a call from the police, Mary enters a mental hospital, and as Joe begins to buckle under the pressure of his circumstances, he quits his job and devotes all his spare time to building a sailboat, a project that reminds him of better days for Mary and himself. Canvas was the first feature film from writer and director Joseph Greco, who drew inspiration from the story of his mother, who was diagnosed with schizophrenia when he was growing up(n)

programme.title: Rachael Ray
programme.desc: Assembled for television by Oprah Winfrey's production company, the daily, hour-long talkfest Rachael Ray starred the former host of several Food Network programs, the author of several best-selling cookbooks, and the maven of many a popular franchised cooking product. At first glance, Rachael Ray may have seemed to be yet another Martha Stewart clone, but a closer examination revealed that Ray preferred to have a looser and more spontaneous format on her series than was seen on Martha's; also, though she certainly dispensed some cooking and housekeeping tips here and there, she did not confine herself to these domestic pursuit. The set of Rachael Ray was designed by the hostess herself as a "home away from home", complete with stove and plush chairs. Most of the guests on the series were specialized experts whom Ray had met and befriended during her previous TV life on the Food Network. Rachael Ray was first syndicated the week of September 18, 2006 by King World Productions(n)

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: Stallone is back for the fourth time (as Rocky) when an invincible computer-trained Soviet boxer kills his friend in a one-sided bout. Rocky must get ready for one more impossible bout against a clobbering cluck who probably couldn't get his own grandma to root for him. Even though there is probably never any real doubt as to the outcome, this film will likely have viewers on their chairs' edges one more time(n)

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: When a group of missionary aid workers in Myanmar disappear into the vast green inferno, vigilante Vietnam War veteran John Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) leaves his job as a Salween River boatman behind to accompany a group of mercenaries on a daring rescue mission. It's been 20 years since Rambo helped mujahedeen rebels fend off Soviet invaders in Afghanistan, and these days the former soldier lives a simple life in northern Thailand. Meanwhile, the world's longest-running civil war rages into its 60th year on the nearby Thai-Burma border. One day, human rights missionaries Sarah Miller (Julie Benz) and Michael Burnett (Paul Schulze) show up asking Rambo to guide them up the Salween so they can get some much-needed food and medical supplies to the desperate Karen tribe. According to Sarah and Michael, the Burmese military has planted land mines all along the roads leading into the tribe's village, making it virtually impossible to reach the tribe via land. Two weeks after Rambo drops the group off in dangerous territory, pastor Arthur Marsh (Ken Howard) arrives with a chilling message: the aid workers never returned from their mission into the jungle, and the embassies refuse to help Marsh and his fellow missionaries find their missing friends. Now, despite the fact that Rambo has long since sworn off all forms of violence, the knowledge that innocent missionaries are being used as pawns in a brutal war leaves him with no other choice than to venture behind enemy lines on his most dangerous mission to date(n)

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: Though ostensibly a family-oriented outing, Ivan Reitman's Kindergarten Cop ensures that fans of star Arnold Schwarzenegger's action films won't be disappointed by pumping up the Cop half of the equation to a surprisingly high degree. Schwarzenegger stars as John Kimble, an L.A. cop who learns that the ex-wife and son of his drug-dealer quarry Crisp (Richard Tyson) are living in secrecy in small-town Oregon. Kimble is partnered with Phoebe (Pamela Reed), a former teacher, who is slated to begin undercover work at the school where Crisp's ex is suspected of working under an assumed identity. However, Phoebe becomes ill, forcing rough, gruff Kimble to take over the kindergarten class instead(n)

When dirty bombs are detonated over Southern California, a husband (Rory Cochrane) and his wife (Mary McCormack) become quarantined, he inside their house, she outside. As contaminated ash rains down from the sky, chaos reigns across the area as those left out in the open run the risk of being poisoned by the fatal toxins. The film is the directorial debut of production designer Chris Gorak, who also wrote the script(n)

programme.desc: Cold Blooded Horror. Jeremy discovers the most extraordinary monster he has ever encountered when he travels to Japan to explore the truth behind their River Monster legends(n)

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Chainsaw Predator. Extreme angler Jeremy Wade continues on his worldwide mission to locate deadly freshwater fish, whilst investigating legends along the way(n)

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Silent Scream. Erin Greene is walking home from a Halloween party in a small Arctic town when a polar bear chases her down. Also: Triathlete Chuck Anderson is swimming in the Gulf of Mexico when a bull shark attacks, biting his arm and pulling him to the ocean floor(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Diary
programme.desc: Wildebeest Move into the Marsh. As wildebeest cross the Mara River, they're observed by nature photographers and lions. Also studied: leopards(n)

programme.title: Big Cat Diary
programme.desc: Half Tail's New Cubs. A family of servals, small wild felines, is observed(n)

programme.title: Bad Dog!
programme.desc: Dog Gone. An Australian shepherd is an escape artist that opens doors and jumps over fences; a goldendoodle is first in line for the ice-cream truck; an orange tabby is always hungry; a rabbit takes its meal around the house(n)

programme.title: Dogs 101
programme.sub-title: Irish Wolfhound, American Pit Bull Terrier, Gordon Setter, Silky Terrier, Wonder Dogs, Cocker Spaniel and Papillon
programme.desc: Irish Wolfhound, American Pit Bull Terrier, Gordon Setter, Silky Terrier, Wonder Dogs, Cocker Spaniel and Papillon. Which pooch gains a pound a day as a puppy and which breed is banned from flying on certain airlines?(n)

programme.title: Too Cute!
programme.desc: Cuddly Kittens. A litter of Manx kittens includes one with a tail; a Shetland sheepdog pup is born on a farm and becomes obsessed with a Pomeranian that also lives there(n)

programme.title: Too Cute! Pint-Sized
programme.desc: The first few months of animals' lives are observed in a half-hour edition of "Too Cute!"(n)

programme.title: Animal Cops: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Midnight Raid. The 'Pennsylvania Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals' team rescues over 100 birds and dogs from a single property(n)

programme.title: Animal Cops: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Undercover Sting. The team help a dog who has been abandoned in a backyard in freezing temperatures and a cat trapped in a sewer drain(n)

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: New Orleans, Here We Come. In the Season 4 premiere, Tia relocates to New Orleans' 9th Ward, where she hopes to build a new Villalobos and recruit local parolees to join her staff(n)

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Face Off. A family that lost a dog to cancer are hoping to adopt another pet; Tia and her daughter confront a sick and angry dog in New Orleans' 9th Ward(n)

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Jeff Dunham's Tank for Dummies. Ventriloquist Jeff Dunham requests a theater-theme aquarium featuring his familiar puppets, including Walter, Peanut and Achmed, and a submerged chandelier that can be illuminated(n)

programme.title: Railroad Alaska
programme.desc: Frozen Danger. Follow the elite crew of workers - construction crews, mechanics and train drivers - as they battle to keep Alaska's 500-mile-long railroad rolling through the extreme winter(n)

programme.title: Railroad Alaska
programme.desc: Ice Attack. Rising temperatures create a new set of problems for those on and off the rails; Jim and Nancy arrive at an abandoned cabin and discover that there's actually a bear living there; and two members of the crew set off in search of an emergency vehicle(n)

programme.title: Railroad Alaska
programme.desc: Train From Hell. Spring brings new challenges to the off-gridders, who find themselves scrambling to repair their cabins and homesteads; at the same time, the railroad crew prepare to haul a dangerous load of explosives(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: The Rising Tide. Winter is settling into the frontier. A storm has caused dangerous conditions for The Kilchers and their cattle herd, with the risk that some of their livestock may have washed out to sea(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: Winter Warmup. The Kilchers are dealing with a changing Alaskan climate as warmer weather stays around progressively longer. This results in new dangerous challenges, including long treks to hunt for essential meat(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: Family Uprooting. After a second winter of record-breaking heat, the Kilchers need to tame the raw Alaskan wilderness with their new stump-busting equipment. However, not everyone is happy with the project(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: Spring Herding. The unseasonable warmth continues which creates new problems for The Kilchers as they attempt their already dangerous spring cattle drive(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: Black Bear Bow Hunt. While others are occupied planting crops while spring is in season, Atz is off in search of a black bear armed with only his bow to replenish his supply of meat for the coming winter(n)
