programme.desc: King Thistle orders an overworked Mr Elf to take a holiday, pleasing Mrs Elf and Ben at the prospect of a welcome break.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Leah, Shimmer and Shine meet a mermaid and explore her underwater world.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: When Digby tells his friends that they need to go to Peek Rock to see a special event, Grizel and Mungo decide that they have to get there first.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The family goes on holiday in a van that turns into a house at the push of a button.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The family's camper van turns into a boat during a trip to see ducks on a river.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The duo visit the beehive to see how honey is made, and Wise Old Elf shows them his special way of collecting it. Animated series for pre-school children.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: The Championship
programme.desc: Highlights from the latest games in the Championship, which included Sunderland v Derby County at The Stadium of Light, Wolverhampton Wanderers v Middlesbrough at Molineux, and Aston Villa v Hull City at Villa Park.(n)

programme.title: Football on 5: Goal Rush
programme.desc: Goals from the weekend's games in Leagues One and Two, which included Southend United v Blackburn Rovers at Roots Hall, Portsmouth v Rochdale at Fratton Park, and Forest Green Rovers v Barnet at The New Lawn.(n)

programme.title: Cheaper By the Dozen 2
programme.desc: Tom and Kate Baker and their 12 children are enjoying a summer holiday together at their lakeside cabin before the last of the kids flies the nest. All is well until Tom realises arch-rival Jimmy Murtaugh and his family are staying nearby, and even though the youngsters are having fun, the fathers succumb to increasingly frequent displays of one-upmanship. Comedy sequel, with Steve Martin, Eugene Levy, Bonnie Hunt and Hilary Duff.(n)

programme.title: The Royals
programme.sub-title: The Royals: Young, Rich & Famous: The Royal Brat Pack.
programme.desc: Documentary investigating how life for the younger members of the royal family has changed over the years, highlighting the differences between the Duke of Edinburgh's strict upbringing in the early 20th century, and Prince Harry's turbulent youth in the early years of the new millennium.(n)

programme.title: Inside Buckingham Palace: The Queen's Worst Year
programme.desc: An in-depth look at the events of 1992, the year Her Majesty famously dubbed her `annus horribilis' in a speech delivered at London's Guildhall to mark the other anniversary of her Accession. It was a year that saw a fire ravage Windsor Castle, the marriages of Anne, Andrew and Charles collapse, Sarah Ferguson appear topless in the newspapers apparently having her toes sucked by her boyfriend, and Andrew Morton's revelations about Diana made public in a best-selling book. Featuring expert analysis from assorted contributors.(n)

programme.title: Inside Buckingham Palace
programme.desc: The first of two documentaries going behind-the-scenes at Buckingham Palace to find out what life is like beyond its grand exterior. The programmes look back at the 60 years since the Queen's Coronation and explores what might happen to the palace when Prince Charles takes the throne. The opening instalment examines the young Queen's ascent to the throne at the age of 25, Philip's extended overseas visit, and the serious security threats in the 1970s. It also explores the battles between Charles and Diana, Anne and Andrew's divorce, and the use of the palace as a royal stage.(n)

programme.title: Inside Buckingham Palace
programme.desc: Although it is closed and secretive, Buckingham Palace has become a symbol of everything British, despite only being a royal palace for less that 200 years. This second of two programmes reflects on previous monarchs' accomplishments during their reign, from Edward VII's commitment in 1901 to making the palace a royal stage, to George V's decision to change the family name from Saxe-Coburg-Gotha to Windsor. Finally, the programme considers the next King, who could bring about another revolution at the palace and change its role further in the future.(n)

programme.title: Dirty Dancing
programme.desc: A dance instructor at a 1960s resort hotel fears his career will be jeopardised when his regular partner is forced to pull out of an important show in which they are due to perform. Luckily, a naive teenager is happy to step in, and is treated to a whirlwind holiday education in life, love and expressing herself. Romantic drama, starring Patrick Swayze, Jennifer Grey and Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: Cricket on 5
programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: Fourth Test Day Three.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. Highlights of the third day's play in the final Test of the four-match series, which took place at Old Trafford in Manchester.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.sub-title: Dads Make You Laugh Out Loud.
programme.desc: Compilation of internet videos featuring fathers doing bizarre things, including a showcase of the world's most ridiculous dad dancing and some DIY dentistry using a helicopter to remove a loose tooth. With contributions from comedians Ellie Taylor, Angela Barnes and Dave Spikey.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: A chance to catch up with the latest events inside the house as the celebrities cope with living under constant surveillance, with all the arguments and alliances, as well as the revelations in the diary room.(n)

programme.title: The Last Days of
programme.sub-title: The Last Days of Patrick Swayze.
programme.desc: Forensic pathologist Dr Jason Payne-James examines the death of the movie star in 2009, at the age of 57, after developing pancreatic cancer, a condition that had left him all but unrecognisable. The programme explores extensive medical records to construct a timeline of events leading to his death.(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An FBI agent infiltrates a Californian surfing gang suspected of carrying out a series of armed robberies wearing masks modelled on former US presidents. However, his loyalties are tested to the limits when he is befriended by the gang's leader. Kathryn Bigelow's thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Patrick Swayze, Gary Busey and Lori Petty.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun
programme.desc: Drag artist James - aka Dusty Crack - wants to update his Amy Winehouse outfit, but money is tight as he has seen his earnings go down from 100 euros a gig to sometimes as little as 30. Paul and Jacqui run a bar that charges significantly more than other local establishments, but attract customers by offering bingo, quiz nights and British food, while retired Middlesbrough couple Eddie and Pauline are living on a strict budget at Villamar, Benidorm's largest campsite, where they regard their pitch opposite the campsite bins as a bonus.(n)

programme.title: The Railways That Built Britain with Chris Tarrant
programme.sub-title: Steam Is Dead, Long Live the Railways.
programme.desc: Chris examines the devastating impact of the Beeching report, which led to half the country's stations and almost a third of the lines being closed. He also looks at how the railways were reinvented for the modern age, and how a sleek new locomotive not only saved the railway network, but reshaped the country.(n)

programme.title: Great Artists
programme.desc: Art historian Tim Marlow profiles influential painter JMW Turner, who divided the critics with his rapid brush-strokes, treatment of light and tendency toward abstraction, but is now hailed as one of the great British artists.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: A decision is made about a badger cub, the first baby owls of the season arrive, and a frog loses its feet.(n)

programme.title: Chinese Food in Minutes
programme.desc: Food writer and chef Ching-He Huang assists two personal trainers who want to win their friends' approval with a couple of spicy suppers. On the menu are chilli chicken and cashew nuts, and chilli bean cod with an exotic mushroom stir-fry.(n)

programme.title: Poppy Cat
programme.desc: The friends discover that a piece is missing from their new puzzle, but they get hopelessly lost when they set out for Jigsaw Castle to find it.(n)

programme.title: Puffin Rock
programme.desc: Oona organises a get-together in the undergrowth with her friends, but things do not go to plan when Mossy brings along an unusual new friend.(n)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Gaspard and Simon want to play with Dad in the yard, but he keeps disappearing in the weirdest ways.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building pop-up shops out of shipping containers and Scoop decides to further his ambition to become an architect - with hilarious consequences.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Sam and Penny are called into action after Mandy gets trapped in some mountain caves while in search of a bat.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: More railway adventures with the lovable engine and his pals.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Bopping About
programme.desc: Amy and Nathan practise their robots and body-popping in a Street Dance Bop.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: The girls explore an ice palace in their search for a magical gem.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Disappearing Traffic Cones.
programme.desc: All the traffic in Brickabuild is in chaos because the cones have disappeared, so Noddy decides to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Daring Danny X is stuck in a tree over a deep canyon.(n)

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: When there's a job to do and the stakes are high, ten-year-old Rusty Rivets invents his way out of every jam by repurposing parts and objects into the wildest, greatest contraptions ever!.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: Mungo helps Grizel clear up their home and finds the perfect place to deposit their junk - in Chips' treehouse.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George, Peppa, Mummy and Daddy are on holiday in Australia and on their first day they visit the Kangaroo family, who take them to explore the Outback.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George and Peppa visit Mr Fox's shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present.(n)

programme.title: Mofy
programme.desc: Mummy Mouse is knitting a sweater for Daddy Mouse, but while Mofy is helping a ball of wool rolls away and gets lost in the forest.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Lucy flies on Gaston the Ladybird and is invited to a sleepover at the Little Castle.(n)

programme.title: Floogals
programme.desc: When the Boy Hooman builds a model rocket, the Floogals find themselves in a sticky predicament.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Journalist and broadcaster Matthew Wright is joined by a panel of guests and the studio audience to debate the issues of the day.(n)

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Julian Norton gets to grips with castrating alpacas, and among those needing the chop is his old friend Lothario, an infertile stud who is sadly not living up to his name. Back at the surgery, Peter Wright performs a life-changing operation on a pug dog that is struggling to breathe. Other animals receiving the vets' tender, loving care include Hungarian pigs, South American alpacas, a bearded dragon, an extremely fat cat, a heavily pregnant sheep and a clingy chameleon.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: A chance to catch up with the latest events inside the house as the celebrities cope with living under constant surveillance, with all the arguments and alliances, as well as the revelations in the diary room.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Justin and Ben have an argument, while John takes Maggie and her daughters for a tour of the Bay, but things do not go as planned. Brody continues to experience bad hallucinations.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Both Terese and Gary hope that Nick's parole application is successful so he can help her. Mishti is disturbed by the atmosphere in the Sharma-Rebecchi household.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs discovers a link between the murder of a petty officer and the break-up of his team, leading him and new director Leon Vance to uncover a case of blackmail involving an NCIS agent. The duo single out three suspects, but learn vital information has been stolen, and realise the whole Persian Gulf Fleet could be in danger.(n)

programme.title: A Healthy Place to Die: The Gourmet Detective
programme.desc: Charming culinary expert Henry Ross is invited to give a speech at a food conference at a luxury resort, but when a journalist guest goes missing, and later turns up dead, Henry once again finds himself joining forces with no-nonsense police detective Maggie Price to solve the crime. Crime comedy sequel, starring Dylan Neal and Brooke Burns.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Both Terese and Gary hope that Nick's parole application is successful so he can help her. Mishti is disturbed by the atmosphere in the Sharma-Rebecchi household.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Justin and Ben have an argument, while John takes Maggie and her daughters for a tour of the Bay, but things do not go as planned. Brody continues to experience bad hallucinations.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Cricket on 5
programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: Fourth Test Day Four.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. Highlights of the fourth day's play in the final Test of the four-match series, which took place at Old Trafford in Manchester.(n)

programme.title: All New Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Officers deal with a four-car collision outside a primary school, making sure all those injured or hurt are accounted for and also about finding out what happened and who was to blame. A speeding driver is desperate to escape from police and smashes into traffic at a junction, causing carnage before escaping on foot. He has left his passengers behind, but will they help the cops or hinder the course of the investigation? Jamie Theakston presents.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: Marcus Bentley narrates as the housemates lie in their beds, chat on the sofas and argue in the kitchen - all for the enjoyment of the viewers. Will they find being watched by Big Brother's cameras any harder to cope with than life in the public eye?.(n)

programme.title: Make or Break
programme.desc: New series. Eight couples whose relationships have reached breaking point are whisked off to a tropical Mexican resort, where they will find out whether their current squeezes are really right for them. Expert-led behaviour workshops, challenges, and sex therapy sessions aim to give each participant a deeper understanding of themselves, and each other. However, on arriving at the resort, each couple's relationship is put `on a break', and they are forced to swap partners every 48 hours, meaning the temptation to play away might prove too much for some.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal presents the CBB companion show, featuring gossip, chat and features from the house. Including a debate on the burning issues, celebrity guests' thoughts on the latest developments and behind-the-scenes insights.(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Jason Statham leads the cast of this high-octane action-thriller set in the post-industrial wasteland of tomorrow, with the world's most brutal sporting event as its backdrop. A penitentiary full of felons has inspired the jailers to create a grisly pastime ripe for lucrative kickbacks. Now, adrenalised inmates, a global audience hungry for televised violence and a spectacular arena come together to form the Death Race. From expert action director Paul W.S. Anderson and the producers of Mission: Impossible comes Death Race! The stakes don't get any higher than this!(n)

programme.title: The Final Conflict
programme.desc: The Antichrist has garnered an ambassadorship when he sees a trio of stars, which indicates the Second Coming, prompting him to order the slaying of infants born on a designated date, even that of his faithful private secretary(n)

programme.title: Undercover Brother
programme.desc: Eddie Griffin scores as a hip secret agent in this hilarious spoof of blaxploitation flicks, directed by Malcolm D. Lee. Griffin's character works for a black spy organization that's battling "The Man" and his efforts to suppress black culture. Denise Richards costars as White She-Devil. Chris Kattan, Dave Chappelle(n)

programme.title: The Color of Money
programme.desc: A pool hustler mentors a talented young player and his street-smart girlfriend, but his attempts to corrupt the young man make him reassess his own decisions in life(n)

programme.title: Private Benjamin
programme.desc: Devastated when her brand-new husband drops dead, ditsy socialite Judy Benjamin buys a pitch delivered by a duplicitous recruiter for the Women's Army Corps. Quickly advised that she won't receive the luxury accommodations she'd been promised, Judy is forced to go through basic training like any other "grunt."(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its oppressive faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey outside of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind(n)

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Romantic comedy. A middle-aged teacher and would-be writer takes his soon-to-be married friend on a week-long road trip through California's wine country. While meditating on friendship, love and regret, they meet two free-spirited local women who make them confront their futures(n)

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: (2010) Michael Cera (Juno, Superbad) stars in this unconventionally structured, inventive and comic paean to the alternate universe of manga and computer gaming. The movie is based on an acclaimed series of graphic novels by Canadian cartoonist Bryan Lee O'Malley, and is directed by British film-maker Edgar Wright (Shaun of the Dead, Channel 4's TV series Spaced), here making his Hollywood debut. Computer game fanatic Scott Pilgrim (Cera) is the bass player with Toronto band Sex Bob-omb. He shares his flat with his slightly-out-of-control gay friend Wallace Wells (Kieran Culkin), and courts a little controversy by dating 17-year-old schoolgirl Knives Chau (Ellen Wong). However, theirs is a fairly platonic relationship, and one he's prepared to ditch the moment he sets eyes on the woman (literally) of his dreams: Ramona Flowers (Mary Elizabeth Winstead). But if Scott wants to capture the impossibly cool New Yorker's heart, he must first defeat her former lovers, the Seven Evil Exes, in video game end-level-style combat. So he embarks on a kinetic, romantic quest, largely conducted within his own head, replete with slapstick violence, impressive effects and witty retorts(n)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz, and Lucy Liu return alongside director McG for the sequel Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle. In this adventure, the Angels are assigned by Charlie to track down a pair of missing rings encoded with the names of every federal witness in the government's protection and relocation program. The women employ all of the skills seen in the first film in order to stop the bad guys (and bad girls). Bill Murray declined to appear in the sequel. The role of Bosley has been taken over by Bernie Mac. Demi Moore rounds out the cast of this big-budget spectacle(n)

programme.title: The Last Boy Scout
programme.desc: An ex-quarterback teams up with a down-on-his-luck PI whose quarry is murdered while he was supposed to be protecting her(n)

programme.title: Rendition
programme.desc: The director of the Academy Award-winning 2006 crime drama Tsotsi returns to the helm with this tale of a Middle East CIA operative who begins to have doubts about his latest assignment after witnessing the interrogation of a suspected suicide bomber by secret police. When Egyptian-born chemical engineer Anwar El-Ibrahimi (Omar Metwally) mysteriously vanishes on a routine flight from South Africa to Washington, his wife, Isabella (Reese Witherspoon), embarks on a frantic international search for her missing husband. At the same time, a CIA analyst (Jake Gyllenhaal) arrives at a clandestine detention facility outside of United States. As the interrogation of El-Ibrahimi gets under way, the CIA analyst is profoundly shaken by the unorthodox methods used by the man's captors, and quickly begins to reevaluate his assignment. Peter Sarsgaard, Meryl Streep, and Alan Arkin co-star in this topical political thriller penned by Kelley Sane and produced by Steve Golin(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its oppressive faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey outside of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A mysterious artificial being evolves faster than anticipated, and a corporate consultant is enlisted to determine the test subject's fate(n)

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy
programme.desc: A young stud who is going nowhere fast in small-town Texas heads for New York in this classic downbeat drama which won an Oscar for best picture. On the sleazy streets of the Big Apple, Joe Buck's dreams of finding glamour and adventure are shattered by a succession of unsavoury incidents, but he finds a friend in the unlikely shape of Ratso Rizzo, a street hustler with a wasting lung disease(n)

programme.title: The Fly II
programme.desc: Martin Brundle, son of the late Brundlefly from the first chapter, is born under the watchful eye of Anton Bartok, an unscrupulous scientific tycoon, determined to discover the secret of the teleportation pods invented by Martin's father. As time goes by, and Martin begins to develop certain characteristics that mark him as abnormal, he begins to realize that his foster father's motives are less than honourable(n)

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this energetic and influential story about a maverick cop's obsessive attempts to bring a cold-blooded serial killer to justice before he kills again(n)

programme.title: Sugar
programme.desc: Filmmakers Ryan Fleck and Anna Boden (Half Nelson) weave this introspective sports drama concerning a talented Dominican baseball player who longs to break into the American big league and earn the money needed to support his impoverished family. Miguel Santos is a talented pitcher who might just have what it takes to earn a prized spot on a Major League Baseball team, but before that happens he'll have to prove his worth in the minor leagues. Advancing into the United States' minor league system at the tender age of 19, Miguel is warmly welcomed into the small-town Iowa home of his host family, but can't help but struggle with language and cultural barriers despite the kindness of strangers. Subsequently forced to reevaluate his life's ambition after his once-trusty arm becomes unreliable, the previously single-minded pitcher gradually begins to question both the world he lives in and the role he has chosen to play in it(n)

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: In this offbeat love story, a woman falls for an oddly principled hit man who kills anyone who hires him to commit murder. While she believes she's finally found the perfect guy, their romance is threatened by an FBI agent who's hunting her new beau(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Riotous campus comedy in which a lawyer unwittingly gives his thirty-something friends an opportunity to recapture their college years when he relocates to a local university. Having caught his wife cheating on him, the out-of-luck attorney finds his new house turning into a 24-hour party pad for a variety of misfit college students, middle-aged slackers and elderly retirees as he struggles to avoid being evicted by the new Dean of Students(n)

programme.title: Auto Focus
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear stars in this gritty true story about the rise and fall of a well-loved television actor whose life descends into a world of amateur porn and orgies. Bob Crane, the star of American sitcom Hogan's Heroes was a household name in the '60s but he lived a secret life that was scandalous even by Hollywood standards. This is the story of his life and the sordid events that may have led to his murder in 1978, a crime that's still officially unsolved. Also stars Willem Dafoe and Maria Bello(n)

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: An Afghanistan War veteran living in London seeks revenge against his pregnant girlfriend's killer by assuming an upper-class identity and using his connections in the Chinese mob(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: Medieval fantasy meets futuristic science fiction in this effects-heavy action epic from former X-Files director Rob Bowman. In present-day London, 12-year-old Quinn Abercromby witnesses the awakening of a hibernating dragon from a centuries-long slumber, the result of a construction dig supervised by his mother and an incident for which Quinn feels partially responsible. Twenty years later, the adult Quinn is the fire chief of a refortified castle community, responsible for dousing the blazes lit by the dragon's prodigious number of flame-spewing offspring, airborne juggernauts that have wreaked havoc across the globe, torching civilization and turning humans into an endangered species. Hope arrives in the form of Denton "Dragon Slayer" Van Zan, an American known to be the only man to ever kill one of the dragons, and Alex Jenson, a scientist/pilot who's a member of Van Zan's army, a zealous fighting force that includes a secret weapon: the Archangels, paratroopers using themselves as bait to attract and then dispatch the deadly beasts(n)

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In this horror sequel, a game of Ouija leads to supernatural activity. The youngest daughter of a widow is possessed by an evil spirit as the family goes through hell to try desperately to save her(n)

programme.title: The Omen
programme.desc: After his wife gives birth to a stillborn child, the American ambassador to Britain switches two kids in their hospital cribs. What he doesn't know is that little Damien is the Anti-Christ. Seminal 70s horror(n)

programme.title: As Above, So Below
programme.desc: A group of young people uncover a disturbing secret when they venture into the catacombs below Paris(n)

programme.title: Incarnate
programme.desc: An unconventional exorcist must use his psychic abilities to do battle with a malevolent demon that has taken over an innocent 11-year-old boy. Later, he learns that the paranormal entity is also responsible for the deaths of his wife and child(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Jason Statham leads the cast of this high-octane action-thriller set in the post-industrial wasteland of tomorrow, with the world's most brutal sporting event as its backdrop. A penitentiary full of felons has inspired the jailers to create a grisly pastime ripe for lucrative kickbacks. Anderson and the producers of Mission: Impossible comes Death Race! The stakes don't get any higher than this!(n)

Chris Kattan, Dave Chappelle(n)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz, and Lucy Liu return alongside director McG for the sequel Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle. In this adventure, the Angels are assigned by Charlie to track down a pair of missing rings encoded with the names of every federal witness in the government's protection and relocation program. The women employ all of the skills seen in the first film in order to stop the bad guys (and bad girls). Bill Murray declined to appear in the sequel. The role of Bosley has been taken over by Bernie Mac. Demi Moore rounds out the cast of this big-budget spectacle(n)

programme.title: The Last Boy Scout
programme.desc: An ex-quarterback teams up with a down-on-his-luck PI whose quarry is murdered while he was supposed to be protecting her(n)

programme.title: Rendition
programme.desc: The director of the Academy Award-winning 2006 crime drama Tsotsi returns to the helm with this tale of a Middle East CIA operative who begins to have doubts about his latest assignment after witnessing the interrogation of a suspected suicide bomber by secret police. When Egyptian-born chemical engineer Anwar El-Ibrahimi (Omar Metwally) mysteriously vanishes on a routine flight from South Africa to Washington, his wife, Isabella (Reese Witherspoon), embarks on a frantic international search for her missing husband. At the same time, a CIA analyst (Jake Gyllenhaal) arrives at a clandestine detention facility outside of United States. As the interrogation of El-Ibrahimi gets under way, the CIA analyst is profoundly shaken by the unorthodox methods used by the man's captors, and quickly begins to reevaluate his assignment. Peter Sarsgaard, Meryl Streep, and Alan Arkin co-star in this topical political thriller penned by Kelley Sane and produced by Steve Golin(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its oppressive faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey outside of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A mysterious artificial being evolves faster than anticipated, and a corporate consultant is enlisted to determine the test subject's fate(n)

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy
programme.desc: A young stud who is going nowhere fast in small-town Texas heads for New York in this classic downbeat drama which won an Oscar for best picture. On the sleazy streets of the Big Apple, Joe Buck's dreams of finding glamour and adventure are shattered by a succession of unsavoury incidents, but he finds a friend in the unlikely shape of Ratso Rizzo, a street hustler with a wasting lung disease(n)

programme.title: The Fly II
programme.desc: Martin Brundle, son of the late Brundlefly from the first chapter, is born under the watchful eye of Anton Bartok, an unscrupulous scientific tycoon, determined to discover the secret of the teleportation pods invented by Martin's father. As time goes by, and Martin begins to develop certain characteristics that mark him as abnormal, he begins to realize that his foster father's motives are less than honourable(n)

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this energetic and influential story about a maverick cop's obsessive attempts to bring a cold-blooded serial killer to justice before he kills again(n)

programme.title: Sugar
programme.desc: Filmmakers Ryan Fleck and Anna Boden (Half Nelson) weave this introspective sports drama concerning a talented Dominican baseball player who longs to break into the American big league and earn the money needed to support his impoverished family. Miguel Santos is a talented pitcher who might just have what it takes to earn a prized spot on a Major League Baseball team, but before that happens he'll have to prove his worth in the minor leagues. Advancing into the United States' minor league system at the tender age of 19, Miguel is warmly welcomed into the small-town Iowa home of his host family, but can't help but struggle with language and cultural barriers despite the kindness of strangers. Subsequently forced to reevaluate his life's ambition after his once-trusty arm becomes unreliable, the previously single-minded pitcher gradually begins to question both the world he lives in and the role he has chosen to play in it(n)

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: In this offbeat love story, a woman falls for an oddly principled hit man who kills anyone who hires him to commit murder. While she believes she's finally found the perfect guy, their romance is threatened by an FBI agent who's hunting her new beau(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Riotous campus comedy in which a lawyer unwittingly gives his thirty-something friends an opportunity to recapture their college years when he relocates to a local university. Having caught his wife cheating on him, the out-of-luck attorney finds his new house turning into a 24-hour party pad for a variety of misfit college students, middle-aged slackers and elderly retirees as he struggles to avoid being evicted by the new Dean of Students(n)

programme.title: Auto Focus
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear stars in this gritty true story about the rise and fall of a well-loved television actor whose life descends into a world of amateur porn and orgies. Bob Crane, the star of American sitcom Hogan's Heroes was a household name in the '60s but he lived a secret life that was scandalous even by Hollywood standards. This is the story of his life and the sordid events that may have led to his murder in 1978, a crime that's still officially unsolved. Also stars Willem Dafoe and Maria Bello(n)

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: An Afghanistan War veteran living in London seeks revenge against his pregnant girlfriend's killer by assuming an upper-class identity and using his connections in the Chinese mob(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: Medieval fantasy meets futuristic science fiction in this effects-heavy action epic from former X-Files director Rob Bowman. In present-day London, 12-year-old Quinn Abercromby witnesses the awakening of a hibernating dragon from a centuries-long slumber, the result of a construction dig supervised by his mother and an incident for which Quinn feels partially responsible. Twenty years later, the adult Quinn is the fire chief of a refortified castle community, responsible for dousing the blazes lit by the dragon's prodigious number of flame-spewing offspring, airborne juggernauts that have wreaked havoc across the globe, torching civilization and turning humans into an endangered species. Hope arrives in the form of Denton "Dragon Slayer" Van Zan, an American known to be the only man to ever kill one of the dragons, and Alex Jenson, a scientist/pilot who's a member of Van Zan's army, a zealous fighting force that includes a secret weapon: the Archangels, paratroopers using themselves as bait to attract and then dispatch the deadly beasts(n)

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil

programme.desc: The Farrelly Brothers all-out comedy film stars Jim Carrey as Charlie, a nice-guy cop who's had a hard life - on his wedding day, his wife ran off with the wedding car driver, leaving him to bring up triplets. Fifteen years later, he's had enough of the jokes and jibes and out bursts Hank, a bad cop character who will bust anyone for anything. But then he and his long-suffering girlfriend Irene come across cop corruption and, pursued by the evil Lt Gerke, must go on the run, and need both Charlie and Hank's special skills to keep them alive(n)

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: When a one-night stand that should have stayed that way has unexpected consequences, the reluctant odd couple attempts to transform their tentative relationship into a lasting love in this conception comedy. Twenty-four-year-old entertainment journalist Alison Scott (Katherine Heigl) is on the fast track to the big time, but an alcohol-fueled hookup with responsibility-shirking slacker Ben Stone (Seth Rogen) finds her professional priorities taking a back seat to having a baby. Now, as overgrown kid Ben attempts to assume the responsibilities of fatherhood, he makes the brave decision to stand by Alison. In order to make things work between the pair, however, there's going to have to be some compromise, and when Alison and Ben decide to take a shot at love, they quickly find that building a relationship from scratch isn't nearly as easy as making a baby(n)

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: In the art of crashing weddings, John Beckwith (Owen Wilson) and Jeremy Grey (Vince Vaughn) are Washington D.C.'s undisputed masters. Guided by their intricate wedding-crashing rules, each week they charm their way into a different wedding -- and romance a different woman to boot. But when they crash the biggest wedding of the year, the ultimate crashers soon find themselves in over their heads as they become hilariously entangled in the eccentricity of the influential political family hosting the event. Christopher Walken, Jane Seymour, Rachel McAdams, Isla Fisher, and Bradley Cooper round up a cast with impressive star wattage and impeccable comedic timing(n)

programme.desc: The Beast With a Billion Backs. The creator of The Simpsons, Matt Groening, is responsible for this animated series. Set in the year 3000, the series follows Fry (voiced by Billy West), a 25- year-old New York pizza delivery boy who, after being accidentally cryogenically frozen, wakes up to a whole new world. The future he discovers has airborne freeways, rocket ships, talking heads in jars, dangerously addictive soft drinks and Stop 'n' Drop suicide booths. Fortunately he has on hand his friends Bender (voiced by John DiMaggio), a hard-drinking, cigar-smoking, pornography-reading robot, and Leela (voiced by Katey Sagal), a beautiful, one-eyed alien martial arts expert, to help him make sense of this new environment(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.sub-title: Dead Woman Walking: The Karla Faye Tucker Story
programme.desc: Dead Woman Walking: The Karla Faye Tucker Story. This documentary, part of the American Justice series from A&E, examines the Texas death penalty case of Karla Faye Walker. Narrated by American Justice host and producer Bill Kurtis, this episode goes inside the investigation of the two murders that Walker and her boyfriend Daniel Ryan Garrett committed. The trial of Walker is shown through exclusive footage. After the conviction, American Justice follows her through her daily life, showing her prison surroundings and talking with her about her crimes. Sentenced to death, while Walker was waiting to be executed, she became a born-again Christian. Her lawyers used this transformation as leverage to try to get her death sentence reduced to life in prison. Their attempts were unsuccessful and Walker was killed by lethal injection in February 1998. American Justice also shows interviews with lawyers and law enforcement professionals who knew Walker(n)

programme.title: The Bill

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Callum and Kirsty answer a call about a disturbance at the home of an elderly widow and discover she has been raped as well as burgled. The sergeant is also struggling with family problems after learning he may be running out of time to reach a reconciliation with his estranged father.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: It's Christmas time in Poplar and love is in the air as Jenny's relationship with Alec continues to blossom, while Shelagh is planning her quiet wedding to Dr Turner. However, the peace is suddenly disturbed when the police arrive at Nonnatus House to announce an unexploded bomb has been discovered just around the corner and everybody in the district is being evacuated to safety. The electricity has been cut off and the streets are pitch-black, and with the locals scurrying to safety, the nuns and nurses reach out to anyone in need of medical help. The spirit of the Blitz takes over as the community's members pull together - aware that, at any moment, their homes could be reduced to rubble. Jessica Raine, Jenny Agutter, Pam Ferris and Laura Main star in a festive special of the 1950s-set drama, with a guest appearance by comedian Sandi Toksvig.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Easter approaches in the spring of 1961, and Patsy helps to deliver a baby that is born with severe deformities. Her husband struggles to cope with his daughter's needs, but the sisters rally round to support the family. Trixie teaches a keep fit class which results in a medical emergency, leaving her determined to teach her patients to understand their own bodies.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife

When her life comes under threat from an unseen gunman, they have to spirit her away before he shoots again, and the group takes refuge in a fortified convent, where Aramis comes face to face with his past. programme.title: Super Senses: The Secret Power of Animals
programme.desc: Biologist Patrick Aryee and physicist Helen Czerski explore the world of animal senses to reveal how they detect things beyond the limits of human perception, conducting experiments and demonstrations featuring a variety of species. They begin by investigating sight and reveal how caribou - wild reindeer of Alaska - use ultraviolet light to avoid their predators. They also discover how the dragonfly's ability to view things in slow motion allows it to make a kill, and show how a snake can see in the pitch dark without using its eyes.(n)

programme.title: Super Senses: The Secret Power of Animals
programme.desc: Biologist Patrick Aryee and physicist Helen Czerski continue their exploration of the world of animal senses by investigating sound - from the deepest rumbles to the highest squeaks - using specialised technology to detect noises beyond the range of human hearing. They reveal how alligators use low-pitch sounds to make the water around them `dance', show what it is like to be a bat and see with echo-location, and convert a classic camper van into a giant speaker to conduct the ultimate hearing test for a herd of elephants.(n)

programme.title: Super Senses: The Secret Power of Animals
programme.desc: The concluding episode explores the world of scent and examines the animals that have pushed their sense of smell far beyond human capabilities. In the Bahamas, physicist Helen Czerski dives into shark-infested waters with only a small pouch of liquid as her defence against them, while biologist Patrick Aryee controls the behaviour of a swarm of bees by using tiny traces of scent, and gets uncomfortably close to a skunk.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Jaguar
programme.desc: Scientists, climbers and wildlife film-makers explore the rainforests of Guyana, a former British colony in South America. Cameraman Gordon Buchanan finds giant otters almost as large as he is, canopy expert Justine Evans observes a family of red howler monkeys, and biologist Steve Backshall probes a habitat below a massive waterfall where frogs and freshwater crabs happily co-exist.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Jaguar
programme.desc: The team travels deeper into the Guyanan jungle and scorpions and poisonous centipedes enter the base camp. Gordon Buchanan discovers an animal is stealing supplies and Steve Backshall finds giant piranha and long-fanged sabretooth fish in the river. Meanwhile, George McGavin catches an enormous tarantula and the climbing team tries to scale a huge unclimbed mountain at the forest's edge.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Jaguar
programme.desc: Steve Backshall reaches the summit of a table-top mountain, after climbing a vertical cliff face nearly as high as the Empire State Building. Meanwhile, Dr George McGavin and Gordon Buchanan have to haul three boats and all their kit through the jungle after finding the rapids of the Rewa River impassable. At the end of the journey, George presents a report on the expedition to the President of Guyana, Bharrat Jagdeo.(n)

programme.desc: In the Bay of Fundy, scientists search for the earliest dinosaurs, while a team in British Columbia tracks dino-prints up a steep rock face.(n)

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve Backshall searches for Earth's 60 deadliest animals, beginning by visiting South Africa, where he encounters a hippo and tracks down crocodiles. He also gets up close and personal with several lethal snakes and spiders.(n)

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve Backshall investigates whether Nile crocodiles deserve their reputation as killers, and pits his fishing skills against those of the African sea eagle.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Camera crews follow the activities of wildlife in the Arctic and Antarctic, including an emperor penguin colony's nine-month migration across sea ice to its breeding ground. The team also takes aerial and underwater shots to capture humpback whales feeding and tracks a male polar bear as it swims 100km to find new ice from which to hunt seals.(n)

programme.desc: The team go in search of the weedy sea dragon and investigate why parts of the Southern Ocean are warming much faster than other oceans.(n)

programme.title: Volcano Hell
programme.desc: In 1985 an eruption in Colombia killed 20,000 people asleep in the town below, leaving the scientific community horrified that they were unable to avert this tragedy by foreseeing extreme volcanic activity in the region. The programme follows the subsequent quest of two researchers to find a method of prediction, and reveals how years later, when they thought they had achieved their goal, they clashed over one volcano - leading to the shattering of reputations, but also the solving of the problem once and for all.(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese re-creates the mean streets of Manhattan in this historical epic set in the 1860s. Daniel Day-Lewis is a brutal gang leader; Leonardo DiCaprio, a victim's son(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Ben Gates is off on another thrilling treasure hunt in this action-packed sequel involving a missing page from John Wilkes Booth's diary, which leads to a globe-trotting race to find an ancient city of gold(n)

programme.title: Die Another Day
programme.desc: Pierce Brosnan plays superspy James Bond for the fourth time in this action-packed adventure. This time out, 007 and an enigmatic woman named Jinx (Halle Berry) take on a madman with a satellite-laser weapon. Madonna sings the title song and has a cameo. Rick Yune(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: Julianne Potter is horrified when she hears that her best friend, Michael O'Neal, is getting hitched; it was meant to be her! Installed as the maid of honour, she has just four days to convince him that Kimberly Wallace, who's beautiful, smart and loaded, isn't the girl for him. After Muriel's Wedding , PJ Hogan pulls off another successful nuptial comedy-drama(n)

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers
programme.desc: Action-packed adventure based on an actual incident in the American Civil War. General Grant, the leader of the Union forces, orders a colonel and an army surgeon to lead a small cavalry unit 300 miles into Confederate territory to sabotage a strategically critical railway supply line(n)

programme.title: Lonesome Dove
programme.desc: Leaving. Former Texas Rangers begin a cattle drive to Montana(n)

programme.title: Lonesome Dove
programme.desc: On The Trail. A pursuit on the plains pits Gus against a rebel who has kidnapped Lorena(n)

programme.title: Lonesome Dove
programme.desc: The Plains. Part 3 of four. Off the trail, Jake (Robert Urich) falls in with bad company, while Gus (Robert Duvall) shares a bittersweet reunion with an old flame (Anjelica Huston). Call: Tommy Lee Jones. Lorena: Diane Lane. Newt: Ricky Schroder. Deets: Danny Glover. Suggs: Dan O'Herlihy. Elmira: Glenne Headly(n)

programme.title: Lonesome Dove
programme.desc: Return. Conclusion. A tragedy in the Montana Territory exacts a painful promise from Call (Tommy Lee Jones) that takes him on a haunting mission back to Texas. Gus: Robert Duvall. Newt: Ricky Schroder. Pea Eye Parker: Tim Scott. Clara: Anjelica Huston. Lorena: Diane Lane. Dish: D.B. Sweeney. Blue Duck: Frederic Forrest(n)

programme.title: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
programme.desc: Secret agent James Bond travels around the world searching for criminal mastermind Ernst Blofeld, and finds an unexpected ally in a troubled young Contessa whom 007 considers marrying(n)

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Crashing on an unknown planet in the year 2029, astronaut Leo Davidson is caught up in a savage society where apes keep human slaves(n)

programme.title: Octopussy
programme.desc: This (13th) time around, 007 (once again played by Roger Moore) receives the usual call to come and visit M when another agent drops off a fake Faberge jeweled egg at the British embassy in East Berlin and is later killed at a traveling circus. Suspicions mount when the assistant manager of the circus Kamal (Louis Jourdan), outbids Bond for the real Faberge piece at Sotheby's. Bond follows Kamal to India where the superspy thwarts many an ingenious attack and encounters the antiheroine of the title (Maud Adams), an international smuggler who runs the circus as a cover for her illegal operations. It does not take long to figure out that Orlov (Steven Berkoff), a decidedly rank Russian general is planning to raise enough money with the fake Faberges to detonate a nuclear bomb in Europe and then defeat NATO forces once and for all in conventional warfare. John Glen returns again to handle directing duties, the second of five Bond films he lensed(n)

programme.title: Thirteen Days
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars in this thrilling and beautifully acted political drama about the Cuban Missile Crisis. Set in October 1962, the film chronicles how President Kennedy's bickering, backbiting staff tried to avert a nuclear war with the Soviet Union. Bruce Greenwood stars as JFK. Steven Culp, Dylan Baker, Henry Strozier(n)

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: Spike Jonze's imaginative black comedy about a frustrated puppeteer (John Cusack) who gains access to John Malkovich's brain via a small portal in his office(n)

programme.title: Leviathan
programme.desc: In George Cosmatos' sci-fi thriller, a team of oceanographers discovers a sunken Soviet submarine housing the murderous product of a genetic experiment gone horribly wrong(n)

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Crashing on an unknown planet in the year 2029, astronaut Leo Davidson is caught up in a savage society where apes keep human slaves(n)

programme.title: Never Say Never Again
programme.desc: Essentially, this film is a remake of the 1965 Bond flick Thunderball. James Bond emerges from cozy retirement to cross swords with Largo, a megalomaniacal business exec who steals several nuclear missiles, intending to bring the World Powers to their knees(n)

programme.title: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
programme.desc: Secret agent James Bond travels around the world searching for criminal mastermind Ernst Blofeld, and finds an unexpected ally in a troubled young Contessa whom 007 considers marrying(n)

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: Spike Jonze's imaginative black comedy about a frustrated puppeteer (John Cusack) who gains access to John Malkovich's brain via a small portal in his office(n)

programme.desc: Essentially, this film is a remake of the 1965 Bond flick Thunderball. James Bond emerges from cozy retirement to cross swords with Largo, a megalomaniacal business exec who steals several nuclear missiles, intending to bring the World Powers to their knees(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: Grown-Ass Man. As Season 2 tips off, the Calloways have moved from the penthouse to a regal new mansion, and Cam's new contract and its serious clauses ties him tightly to owner Jimmy Flaherty, who wants to maximise Cam's time(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: A Time to Punch. Cam and M-Chuck are taken by surprise by some media fallout and a DA's scrutiny about domestic abuse, while Uncle Julius squares off with a neighbour whose dog dumps things in the driveway(n)

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Harrison Ford plays ex-CIA agent Jack Ryan who, on a visit to London with his family, foils the assassination of a government minister by the IRA, killing one of the attackers in the process. Swearing vengeance, IRA man Sean Miller follows Ryan and his family to their seaside home in America, where he and his followers plan to exact their revenge. Based on Tom Clancy's novel, directed by Phillip Noyce(n)

programme.title: Death Proof
programme.desc: In Death Proof -- director Tarantino's take on such peddle-to-the-metal shockers as White Line Fever -- Kurt Russell stars as an engine-revving psychopath who prefers to take out his beautiful victims at 200 mph. Originally released into theaters on a double bill with Robert Rodriguez's Planet Terror under the Grindhouse banner, Death Proof finds a group of ladies out on the town pitted against a mysterious figured named Stuntman Mike (Russell), whose vintage automobile has been partially modified to withstand even the most extreme auto collision. Though the maniacal driver himself always comes out relatively unscathed, the same certainly can't be said for the poor young lass in his passenger seat -- or anyone unfortunate enough to be on the road when the urge to kill strikes for that matter. With a list of potential road-kill candidates that includes Rose McGowan, Jordan Ladd, Rosario Dawson, and Vanessa Ferlito, Death Proof takes viewers on an adrenaline-infused drive that's as sexy as it is shocking(n)

programme.title: Pumpkinhead II: Blood Wings
programme.desc: A small-town cop has more to deal with than petty crime when his rebellious daughter resurrects the demonic Pumpkinhead(n)

programme.title: Gotcha!
programme.desc: "Gotcha!" is a puerile but popular campus game at UCLA in which students stalk one another armed with paint-spewing pellet guns. Veterinary student Anthony Edwards may not be any great shakes in the classroom, but he's a whiz at Gotcha. His skills come in handy when Edwards, on vacation in Paris, becomes acquainted with the mysterious Linda Fiorentino. She gets him mixed up in international espionage; fortunately, the well-armed spies aren't quite as adept at "Gotcha" as Edwards is. Most of the film was lensed in Paris and Berlin(n)

programme.title: Cat Run
programme.desc: This intense action comedy follows wannabe chef Anthony and unrepentant womanizer Julian as they team up to start a detective agency, and they get in over their heads while protecting a top-dollar escort with evidence of a conspiracy. Now, the mob, a crooked senator and an unusual assassin are all hot on their trail(n)

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: Two US marines are assigned to guard Navajo radiomen that encrypt military messages in the native dialectal during the World War II(n)

programme.title: The Devil's Own
programme.desc: Controversial thriller about an Irish-American cop who wrestles with his conscience when he learns that his new lodger is an undercover IRA operative on a mission to buy weapons(n)

programme.title: Patton
programme.desc: George C Scott, Karl Malden, Stephen Young, Michael Strong, Frank Latimore, James Edwards. Monumental biopic of the great but controversial US military general, George S Patton. The film follows his World War II career from his triumphs over Rommel in North Africa, through his demotion for mistreating a soldier under his command and up to the Battle of the Bulge. George C Scott's towering performance earned him an Oscar, which he refused to accept(n)

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: Irish playwright Martin McDonagh brings crackling dialogue and pitch-black humour to this tale about hit men laying low after a botched job. Exiled to picturesque Bruges, Belgium, partners Ken and Ray kill time in pubs, museums and medieval churches while awaiting word from their sociopathic boss. The fun is over when he calls with a troubling new assignment(n)

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: A news reporter and her cameraman are assigned to spend an evening shift with the Los Angeles fire service, when a routine call takes them to an incident in an apartment block. Once there they hear blood-curdling screams which lead them to a rabid woman, but on trying to escape they find the building has been sealed and they are now quarantined with a host of murderous infected tenants(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine is found murdered in Quantico, mere hours after calling Gibbs to discuss a possible case. In response, Bishop and McGee go undercover as a married couple to run surveillance on a lieutenant and his wife, who may be connected to the death. Starring Mark Harmon, Emily Wickersham and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A young Navy Seaman is found dead, with his eyes gouged out, after being involved in a car accident. Director Vance makes a rare return to field duty, pairing up with Gibbs to investigate when it becomes clear the killing seems to be connected to the case of Kip Klugman, a former NCIS agent he once locked up for stealing evidence. Starring Mark Harmon and Rocky Carroll.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Abby visits a pharmaceutical lab to investigate a murder case, but when armed men storm the facility and hold everyone hostage, she is trapped within the building with no means of communicating with the outside world. Crime drama, starring Pauley Perrette, Mark Harmon and David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The notorious Tri-State Sniper appears to have claimed another victim when a petty officer is shot dead in a crowded park. However, when the team discovers the killer in question was already in custody on the day of the shooting, it becomes clear a copy-cat is on the loose. As their investigation progresses, the agents learn the victim was recently found guilty of placing a camera in the female changing rooms of the USS Camden, earning himself plenty of enemies - but did any of them hate him enough to kill?.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called to investigate the murder of a retired US Navy lieutenant commander, and the inquiry forces Ducky to reveal he has been working as part of a secret society dedicated to solving cold cases. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a hairdresser and discovers a history of domestic violence. Meanwhile, Brenda's parents visit, but annoy her by spending much of the trip asking about her marriage plans. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Two police officers are killed in Mexico, and evidence suggests the prime suspect is an FBI informant, but with corruption rife among the force in Tijuana, Brenda does not know who to trust. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Members of the squad realise a teenager who was recently killed by his own pipe bomb was not working alone. As they race against the clock to prevent a massacre, they risk paying the ultimate price for their work. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda's parents visit, and pressure her into setting a date for the wedding. However, she cannot resist helping the squad investigate a murder, despite the presence of her guests. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The body of an obese man who stole diamonds from his own shop is discovered in the boot of a car - and the team suspects his illusionist girlfriend might be involved in his death. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Connections are drawn between a man facing vehicular manslaughter charges, and a corrupt state assemblyman who would greatly benefit from a guilty verdict.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A petty officer is kidnapped, but manages to escape her captor, and the team discovers her abduction may be connected to her missing husband. Meanwhile, Abby knits everyone `gifts'.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Torres discovers a witness in an NCIS case is wanted by US Immigration and Customs Enforcement, while Abby, Bishop and McGee hope to sublet Tony's apartment - by wooing his father.(n)

programme.title: Shots Fired
programme.desc: The truth behind both shootings is revealed, as Preston presents the facts to the jurors, and as the Sheriff's Department loses one of its own, the real culprit is unveiled.(n)

programme.title: Baskets
programme.desc: A punch aimed at Logan's face inadvertently collides with Cody's, and as a chain of misunderstandings threatens to spiral out of control, Chip wades in to sort things out.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois gets a job as a postal worker to pay for Stewie's private school and finds an unsent letter from Peter that was meant for an old flame of his.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.sub-title: A Nice Night for a Drive.
programme.desc: Klaus ends up getting transferred into the sat-nav system in Stan's car, and Steve and his friends play a prank on Roger, who decides to terrorise them as he seeks vengeance.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter, Joe, Cleveland and Quagmire help throw Jesus an important birthday party after running into the Son of God at the Quahog Mall. Animation following the misadventures of America's disaster-prone Griffin family, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The Griffin kids complain that their parents enjoy easy lives, so Peter and Lois challenge them to swap places. Things appear to be going well for a while, with Chris working at the brewery and Meg taking her mother's place as home-maker, but the youngsters soon begin to buckle under the pressure of adulthood.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian and Quagmire compete for the affections of each other's old flames, and Peter is furious with the local dry cleaner for losing his favourite white shirt. With the voices of Cheryl Tiegs and Drew Barrymore.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan creates a clone of Steve, and takes the opportunity to challenge Francine to a parenting competition in which they each raise one of the teenagers to determine who has the better child-rearing skills. Meanwhile, Roger tries to find a missing bride and groom in Thailand.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.sub-title: The Best Little Horror House in Langley Falls.
programme.desc: A battle between Stan and Buckle breaks out when they try to outdo each other with their Halloween decorations. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Scott Grimes.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Stewie befriends a teenage pop star, but discovers a surprising secret about her. Meanwhile, Chris tries to convince his family that the evil monkey in his wardrobe is real. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Seth MacFarlane, Mila Kunis and Seth Green.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Quagmire takes parental responsibility for a baby who looks like him, but realises he may not be suitable for fatherhood, and Stewie clones himself so that he can have a personal assistant.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter and the gang interview potential friends to fill the vacancy left by Cleveland's departure, and Brian learns that Quagmire hates him - and only makes matters worse when he tries to find out why.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy

programme.title: American Dad

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes to the Dentist.
programme.desc: Disher visits his dentist for emergency treatment, and witnesses a murder while under anaesthetic. Unfortunately, because he was semi-conscious at the time, Stottlemeyer refuses to believe him - so he quits the force and hires Adrian to solve the mystery. Guest starring Jon Favreau (Iron Man).(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Meets Dale the Whale.
programme.desc: An obese tycoon who once sued Adrian's wife for libel is accused of murdering a judge. A 911 call and the testimony of a 10-year-old boy identify him as the culprit, but nobody knows how the 57st man - who has not left his bed for 11 years - could have got out of the house to commit the crime. Guest starring Adam Arkin (Sons of Anarchy).(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes to the Carnival.
programme.desc: Stottlemeyer rules that Adrian is still not ready to rejoin the force - then adds insult to injury by asking him to prove the innocence of his friend, a police officer accused of murdering a fellow passenger while riding on a fairground Ferris wheel. Tony Shalhoub stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda's parents visit, and pressure her into setting a date for the wedding. However, she cannot resist helping the squad investigate a murder, despite the presence of her guests. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The body of an obese man who stole diamonds from his own shop is discovered in the boot of a car - and the team suspects his illusionist girlfriend might be involved in his death. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The notorious Tri-State Sniper appears to have claimed another victim when a petty officer is shot dead in a crowded park. However, when the team discovers the killer in question was already in custody on the day of the shooting, it becomes clear a copy-cat is on the loose. As their investigation progresses, the agents learn the victim was recently found guilty of placing a camera in the female changing rooms of the USS Camden, earning himself plenty of enemies - but did any of them hate him enough to kill?.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called to investigate the murder of a retired US Navy lieutenant commander, and the inquiry forces Ducky to reveal he has been working as part of a secret society dedicated to solving cold cases. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes to the Asylum.
programme.desc: The police find Adrian wandering round his dead wife Trudy's former home and have him admitted to a psychiatric hospital, where a fellow patient informs him of an unsolved murder dating from four years earlier - which he naturally sets out to solve.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Billionaire Mugger.
programme.desc: The shooting of a billionaire computer mogul during an attempted mugging intrigues the detective - especially once he discovers the attacker was another wealthy businessman. programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A known sex offender is suspected of raping several women and murdering one in her home. His lawyer proves to be a match for Brenda, putting the team at risk of losing the case. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda's plans to organise her wedding are put on hold when a phone containing text messages pointing to a possible murder is found. Fritz's sister Claire, who fancies herself as a psychic, tags along and tries to help with the investigation. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Petty officer Kyle Friedgen is accused of killing his ex-girlfriend, but while his case is dismissed due to a mishandled warrant, his life and reputation are marred by suspicion that he got away with murder. programme.sub-title: Brother, Can You Spare Two Dimes?
programme.desc: Brother, Can You Spare Two Dimes?. Homer's stepbrother asks for a loan after Homer is awarded some cash, presented by Smokin' Joe Frazier(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mr. Plow. Adam West and Linda Ronstadt have cameos as Homer and Barney become competitors in the snow-plowing business. Other voices: Dan Castellaneta, Harry Shearer, Hank Azaria, Nancy Cartwright(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Rosebud. Burns longs for a childhood toy that winds up in the grip of Maggie. The Ramones have a cameo(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A Star Is Burns. Film critic Jay Sherman (Jon Lovitz) is among the judges at the Springfield Film Festival, which Mr. Burns conspires to win by bribing some judges. Other voices include Harry Shearer, Phil Hartman, Hank Azaria, Julie Kavner(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Two Bad Neighbors. The Simpsons are very politically incorrect family. Homer works with pride in a nuclear power plant run with more regard for profit that safety. His wife is Marge, a kind of supermom. They have three kids: Bart, an underachiever ('and proud of it'), Lisa (who is as serious and responsible as Bart isn't), and Maggie(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: You Only Move Twice. In an idyllic planned community, Homer works for a new boss who has trouble with the government. Meanwhile, the rest of the family has difficulty dealing with the bucolic burg(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Last Temptation of Krust. Krusty shuns his old routines in favour of edgier material - and suddenly becomes the hottest comic in show business. Featuring the guest voice of Jay Leno, Steven Wright, Janeane Garofalo, Bobcat Goldthwait and Bruce Baum(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Monty Can't Buy Me Love. After another billionaire makes a memorable impression on Springfield, Burns asks for Homer's help on a quest for popularity, which eventually takes them both to Scotland. Voices: Harry Shearer, Dan Castellaneta, Hank Azaria(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Days of Wine and D'oh'ses. Homer doesn't like it when Barney quits drinking; Bart and Lisa get into trouble when they enter a photo contest for the new phone book cover(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Tennis the Menace. The Simpsons win points for their new tennis court, but constantly lose on Homer's poor play. Serena and Venus Williams, Pete Sampras and Andre Agassi have voice cameos. Julie Kavner, Dan Castellaneta, Yeardley Smith(n)

programme.title: 30 Minutes or Less
programme.desc: Frenzied funnies as a wise-cracking pizza boy is captured, strapped to a bomb and blackmailed for $100,000. He'll need to make a quick delivery or there'll be explosive results(n)

programme.title: Judy Moody and the Not Bummer Summer
programme.desc: A girl looking forward to the summer holidays is faced with a boring break when she realises her friends are going away. However, the future brightens up when she goes to stay with her eccentric aunt and embarks on a series of manic adventures. Comedy based on Megan McDonald's series of children's books, starring Jordana Beatty and Heather Graham.(n)

programme.title: Dunkirk Interview Special
programme.desc: A look at director Christopher Nolan's Second World War drama starring Tom Hardy, Cillian Murphy and Kenneth Branagh.(n)

programme.title: Short Circuit
programme.desc: A military robot is struck by lightning and develops a mind of its own. The machine embarks on a series of comic misadventures, but the company that made him want him back. He realises his only hope is to convince the scientist who invented him that he really is alive. Sci-fi comedy adventure, starring Steve Guttenberg, Ally Sheedy and Fisher Stevens.(n)

programme.title: The Borrowers
programme.desc: A family of four-inch-high people living beneath the floorboards of an ordinary human home help the owner's son fight back when a dastardly lawyer plans to demolish the house and make way for a luxury apartment block. Children's fantasy, starring John Goodman, Jim Broadbent, Celia Imrie, Flora Newbigin and Tom Felton.(n)

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Children's adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci.(n)

programme.title: GI Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: An elite military team is nearly wiped out after a terrorist organisation replaces the US president with an imposter and has them declared enemies of the state. The handful of survivors seek the help of their original leader in avenging their fallen comrades. Action adventure sequel, starring Dwayne Johnson, Ray Park and Bruce Willis.(n)

programme.title: Child 44
programme.desc: A secret police agent in 1950s Russia is disgraced for refusing to denounce his own wife as a traitor. Reassigned to a remote outpost, he tries to bring a serial child murderer to justice, but faces an official cover-up by a rival, who wants to maintain the illusion that Soviet society is without crime. Detective thriller based on Tom Rob Smith's novel, starring Tom Hardy, Gary Oldman and Noomi Rapace.(n)

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: Four soldiers are sent on a top-secret mission in Iraq that results in them being imprisoned for a crime they did not commit. When they learn the culprit is trying to sell equipment for producing fake currency, they break out of prison to find both him and evidence of their innocence. Action adventure based on the 1980s TV series, with Liam Neeson, Bradley Cooper, Sharlto Copley and Quinton `Rampage' Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Wild Bill
programme.desc: A criminal returns to his old neighbourhood after eight years in prison to find the two sons he abandoned are living alone. He is persuaded to move in with the boys to prevent them being taken into care, but attempts to mend his ways are threatened by encounters with his crooked old friends. Crime drama, starring Charlie Creed-Miles, Will Poulter, Sammy Williams and Andy Serkis.(n)

programme.title: BSL Zone
programme.desc: The End is a powerful drama spanning an imagined 60 year period, charting the introduction of the treatment' and the future decline of Deaf culture (SL).'.(n)

programme.title: Big Miracle
programme.desc: A reporter and an environmentalist discover a family of whales has become trapped by rapidly forming ice in the Arctic circle. They organise a coalition of unlikely allies, including Alaskan natives, oil tycoons and the Russian and American military, to pool their resources and rescue the animals. Fact-based drama, starring Drew Barrymore, John Krasinski, Ted Danson and Kristen Bell.(n)

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: An advertising executive tries to start a new life in California with his family and their lumbering, disaster-prone Great Dane. The friendly but clumsy dog accidentally causes chaos for his owners, until an incident at a surfing competition makes him a local celebrity. Comedy, with Lee Pace, and featuring the voice of Owen Wilson.(n)

programme.title: One Fine Day
programme.desc: The working day for two mismatched single professionals is thrown into turmoil when their children have to stay at home after missing a school trip. The pair agree to take it in turns to babysit while struggling to stick to their hectic schedules - but during the course of the day their feelings for each other blossom unexpectedly. Romantic comedy, starring George Clooney, Michelle Pfeiffer, Charles Durning and Mae Whitman.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Dolittle
programme.desc: A Victorian veterinary surgeon is certified insane after developing the ability to talk to his patients in their own language. Undaunted, he manages to escape from the asylum and embarks on a quest to locate a rare aquatic snail. Oscar-winning musical comedy, with Rex Harrison, Samantha Eggar, Richard Attenborough and Anthony Newley. Songs include Talk to the Animals and I've Never Seen Anything Like It.(n)

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: A slobbish guitarist dreams of stardom, but his hopes are dashed when the other members of his band kick him out. Struggling to make ends meet, he takes a job as a supply teacher at an exclusive private school, and sets about moulding his pupils into rock gods. Comedy from director Richard Linklater, starring Jack Black, Joan Cusack, Mike White and Sarah Silverman.(n)

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: An uptight, ambitious FBI agent is sent to Boston to bring a notorious drug kingpin to justice. She ends up forced to team up with a rebellious, foul-mouthed local police detective who has a very different attitude to law enforcement but shares her inability to work with others. Action comedy, starring Sandra Bullock and Melissa McCarthy.(n)

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: A couple have always managed to avoid family festivities by travelling overseas. However, when their flight is cancelled, each of their divorced parents insists they spend yuletide with them - forcing the pair to get through a quartet of Christmas celebrations on the same day. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn and Reese Witherspoon.(n)
