However, a romantic interlude threatens to drive the investigation off course. Comedy thriller sequel, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union, Jordi Molla and Peter Stormare.(n)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper.(n)

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A married lawyer has a one-night stand with a business associate while his wife and children are out of town. He hopes to keep his infidelity a secret, but she is determined to continue the relationship, and begins obsessively stalking him and his unsuspecting family. Thriller, starring Michael Douglas, Glenn Close and Anne Archer.(n)

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: A male escort is falsely accused of murdering a wealthy woman, and his only hope of proving his innocence rests with a client reluctant to come forward and provide him with an alibi. Thriller, written and directed by Paul Schrader, starring Richard Gere, Lauren Hutton and Hector Elizondo.(n)

programme.title: A History of Violence
programme.desc: The owner of an Indiana diner lives a quiet life with his wife, but when armed robbers burst into his restaurant he takes the law into his own hands and becomes a local hero. Reluctant to accept the praise, the unassuming man continues with his simple existence - but a mysterious stranger raises questions about his past. David Cronenberg's thriller, adapted from the graphic novel, starring Viggo Mortensen, Maria Bello and Ed Harris.(n)

programme.title: Loss of Faith
programme.desc: A crime writer is drawn into intrigue and danger while investigating the kidnapping of a baby boy and the murder of the child's wealthy father. Mystery thriller, starring John Ritter, Michele Scarabelli, Daphne Zuniga and Roddy McDowall.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac.(n)

programme.title: Blood Orange
programme.desc: Ageing rock star Bill receives a visit from Lucas, the ex-lover of his younger wife Isabelle, who demands she give him an inheritance he claims she has denied him. Bill invites Lucas to stay, hoping to make peace between them, but Lucas has a plan to get revenge, and manipulates the pool boy into helping him. Thriller, starring Iggy Pop and Kacey Clarke.(n)

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: A chance encounter with an old friend derails a successful lawyer's fast-track career, plunging him headlong into a deadly game of cat and mouse with relentless government agents capable of anticipating his every move. He quickly realises the only way to save his own life is to expose the truths his pursuers seem so intent on covering up, and seeks out a former intelligence agent to take them on at their own game. Thriller, starring Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight and Lisa Bonet.(n)

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: A man travelling through Chile in the 1970s is abducted by the secret police during the military coup that brought Pinochet to power. His girlfriend tries to find out what has happened to him, but to uncover the truth, she must join a cult posing as a charitable organisation, from which no one has ever escaped. Drama, starring Emma Watson and Daniel Bruhl.(n)

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin
programme.desc: An inner-city drug dealer puts his life of crime behind him after a near-fatal shooting to pursue a new career as a rap artist. Unfortunately, when he performs songs inspired by his shady past, his former criminal associates do not take kindly to having their misdeeds immortalised in music. Drama, starring Curtis `50 Cent' Jackson, Terrence Howard and Ashley Walters.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac.(n)

programme.title: The Man from UNCLE
programme.desc: A CIA agent is forced into an uneasy alliance with his arch-rival in the KGB at the height of the Cold War. A criminal organisation is planning to alter the balance of power by making nuclear weapons widely available, and the two spies must work together to foil the plan. Action adventure based on the 1960s TV series, starring Henry Cavill, Armie Hammer, Alicia Vikander and Hugh Grant.(n)

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin
programme.desc: An inner-city drug dealer puts his life of crime behind him after a near-fatal shooting to pursue a new career as a rap artist. Unfortunately, when he performs songs inspired by his shady past, his former criminal associates do not take kindly to having their misdeeds immortalised in music. Drama, starring Curtis `50 Cent' Jackson, Terrence Howard and Ashley Walters.(n)

programme.title: Imperium
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent infiltrates a white supremacist movement to prevent their planned terrorist attack. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Radcliffe and Toni Collette.(n)

programme.title: How Green Was My Valley
programme.desc: Residents of a Welsh mining community at the start of the 20th century struggle to come to terms with the decline in their traditional way of life. Oscar-winning drama, starring Walter Pidgeon, Maureen O'Hara, Donald Crisp and Roddy McDowall.(n)

programme.title: Nine Months
programme.desc: A child psychologist's well-ordered world begins to fall apart when his live-in girlfriend announces she is pregnant. Not fond of children anyway, he dreads the impact a baby will make on his life - and to make matters worse, their eccentric Russian obstetrician admits he has never delivered a baby before. Romantic comedy, starring Hugh Grant, Julianne Moore, Jeff Goldblum, Joan Cusack and Tom Arnold, with Robin Williams in a cameo role.(n)

programme.title: The Way We Were
programme.desc: Upper-class novelist Hubbell Gardiner and Jewish political activist Katie Morosky meet at college in the 1930s and later marry. Although very much in love, their opposing political outlooks lead to conflict when Hubbell's successful career as a Hollywood screenwriter is compromised by his wife's socialist leanings. As the 1950s dawn it becomes clear their differences are too great to overcome. Romantic drama, with Robert Redford, Barbra Streisand, Bradford Dillman and Murray Hamilton.(n)

programme.title: The Sound of Music
programme.desc: A cheerful novice nun is employed as governess to the seven children of an austere widower. As she brings light, laughter and a love of all things harmonious to a family previously beset by grief and strict discipline she also falls in love with her employer. But before long, the looming threat of the Second World War jeopardises their happy household. Oscar-winning Rodgers and Hammerstein musical, starring Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer and Eleanor Parker.(n)

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death takes over the body of a recently deceased young man, and embarks on a mission to claim the life of a powerful media tycoon, but ends up falling in love with his daughter instead - leaving him on the horns of a dilemma. Remake of 1934 romantic fantasy Death Takes a Holiday, starring Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins and Claire Forlani.(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: An idealistic sports agent produces a mission statement at work promising to treat clients fairly. Unfortunately, it costs him his job. Forced to set up an agency on his own, the only people prepared to stand by him are a lovelorn staff accountant and a footballer. Cameron Crowe's romantic comedy drama, with Tom Cruise, Renee Zellweger, Kelly Preston, Jonathan Lipnicki, and Cuba Gooding Jr, who won an Oscar for his performance.(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: A teenager enjoys a night of adventures with a mysterious girl, whom he has been fascinated with since childhood. The next day she disappears without trace, but he discovers she has left him a series of clues, which he and his friends follow in the hope of finding her. Romantic mystery based on the novel by John Green, starring Nat Wolff and Cara Delevingne.(n)

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death takes over the body of a recently deceased young man, and embarks on a mission to claim the life of a powerful media tycoon, but ends up falling in love with his daughter instead - leaving him on the horns of a dilemma. Remake of 1934 romantic fantasy Death Takes a Holiday, starring Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins and Claire Forlani.(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: A TV news producer prepares an investigation into then presidential candidate George W Bush's military service record, examining allegations that he exploited family connections to avoid being sent to Vietnam and failed to fulfil basic responsibilities as a member of the National Guard. The report proves controversial, and places her career under attack when key evidence is denounced as a forgery. Fact-based drama, starring Cate Blanchett and Robert Redford.(n)

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: A vet working at a Hawaiian zoo falls madly in love with a beautiful woman and pulls out all the stops to romance her. However, his attempts to woo her are seriously undermined by the fact that she suffers from short-term memory-loss, meaning he has to resume his courtship from scratch every day. Romantic comedy, starring Drew Barrymore, Adam Sandler, Rob Schneider and Dan Aykroyd.(n)

programme.title: A Patch of Fog
programme.desc: A famous writer and academic living off the reputation of his single novel resorts to shoplifting to introduce some excitement to his stable life. He is caught in the act by a lonely, unbalanced security guard, who has an unusual price for his silence - he wants them to be friends, and goes to disturbing lengths to force himself into the author's life. Thriller, starring Stephen Graham, Conleth Hill and Lara Pulver.(n)

programme.title: Niagara
programme.desc: Polly and Ray are on honeymoon at Niagara Falls where they meet George and Rose, whose own marriage is falling apart. Polly later discovers that the brazen and alluring Rose has a lover waiting in the shadows and they are scheming to kill the emotionally unstable George - but the newlywed is unable to convince anyone of the danger as the murder plot edges toward a tragic conclusion. Thriller, with Marilyn Monroe, Joseph Cotten and Jean Peters.(n)

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: A cockney lothario leads a charmed life, enjoying casual sex with as many women as possible with no thought of the consequences. However, a series of unexpected setbacks forces him to finally take stock of his life. Comedy drama based on the play by Bill Naughton, starring Michael Caine, Jane Asher, Millicent Martin, Shirley Anne Field, Shelley Winters and Denholm Elliott.(n)

programme.title: Closer to the Moon
programme.desc: Five high-ranking members of the Communist party in 1950s Romania rob a bank and very nearly get away with the crime. When they are finally arrested, they are sentenced to death - but before their execution, they are ordered to re-enact the heist on film, so it can be used in a propaganda movie. Fact-based comedy crime drama, starring Mark Strong and Vera Farmiga.(n)

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: A radio DJ contemplates suicide after a listener embarks on a murderous rampage in response to one of his broadcasts. He is saved by a now-homeless former professor of medieval history, who encourages him to retrieve what he claims is the Holy Grail. When the DJ later learns that he is responsible for his saviour's misfortunes, he feels compelled to make amends. Terry Gilliam's comedy drama, with Robin Williams, Jeff Bridges, Amanda Plummer and Mercedes Ruehl.(n)

programme.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
programme.desc: A determined salesman takes custody of his five-year-old son when his wife leaves him, and secures an unpaid internship with a renowned stockbroking firm. However, the lack of a steady income begins to take its toll on the pair, leading to eviction from their home and a daily struggle to support themselves. Gabriele Muccino's fact-based drama, starring Will Smith alongside his son Jaden. With Thandie Newton, Brian Howe, James Karen, Dan Castellaneta and Kurt Fuller.(n)

programme.title: The Prince of Tides
programme.desc: An American football coach travels to New York hoping to untangle his sister's troubled life aftetr she tries to kill herself. He forms a close relationship with her psychiatrist, who helps him to come to terms with the terrible secrets of his childhood. Romantic drama based on the novel by Pat Conroy, directed by and starring Barbra Streisand. With Nick Nolte, Blythe Danner and Kate Nelligan.(n)

programme.title: Suffragette
programme.desc: A woman joins a campaign to gain the right to vote in 1912. She and her allies find their peaceful protests accomplishing little in the face of an unwavering state, so resort to increasingly violent measures, risking everything they have in the pursuit of political justice. Period drama, starring Carey Mulligan, Helena Bonham Carter, Anne-Marie Duff and Meryl Streep.(n)

programme.title: Fathers and Daughters
programme.desc: A writer still recovering from the death of his wife struggles to retain custody of his daughter as he develops a serious illness. Years later, his daughter is now an adult and faces up to the personal issues brought about by her chaotic childhood as she begins a new relationship. Drama, starring Russell Crowe and Amanda Seyfried.(n)

programme.title: Pretty Woman
programme.desc: A ruthless millionaire hires a prostitute while on a business trip. Realising she may be useful in helping him keep up a successful appearance, he pays her to accompany him for a week as he associates with the rich and powerful - but falls in love despite their many differences. Romantic comedy, starring Richard Gere and Julia Roberts, with Ralph Bellamy and Laura San Giacomo.(n)

programme.title: Ozzy: The Great Furscape
programme.desc: Put to work by an evil kennel owner, Ozzy the beagle and his fellow canine inmates band together and launch a daring escape attempt. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Jacob Tremblay, Will Sasso and Jeff Foxworthy.(n)

programme.title: The Great Gilly Hopkins
programme.desc: A feisty foster kid comes up with an outlandish scheme to be reunited with her birth mum. Coming-of-age drama, starring Kathy Bates, Glenn Close and Sophie Nelisse.(n)

programme.title: Survive the Serengeti: Against the Wild 2
programme.desc: When their plane crash-lands in the African bush, two bickering siblings find themselves force to rely on their wits - and their courageous dog - to help them conquer their fears and survive. Adventure, starring Jeri Ryan, John Paul Ruttan and Ella Ballentine.(n)

programme.title: Maya the Bee Movie
programme.desc: A curious young bee befriends a number of other insects, despite her hive's strict rules on not associating with outsiders. When some of the Queen bee's royal jelly is stolen, she is accused of the crime and needs the help of her friends to track down the real culprits. Animated adventure based on Waldemar Bonsels' children's book, with the voices of Coco Jack Gillies and Kodi Smit-McPhee.(n)

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Outsider Red does not fit in among his island community, but he is the only one to smell a rat when a fleet of green pigs pitch up. Animation, with the voice of Jason Sudeikis.(n)

programme.title: Throne of Elves
programme.desc: In the mythical realm of Altera, young hero Lambert is drawn into a bitter conflict between elf princess Liya and her malevolent rival, Elena. Epic animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Ashley Boettcher and GK Bowes.(n)

programme.title: Survive the Serengeti: Against the Wild 2
programme.desc: When their plane crash-lands in the African bush, two bickering siblings find themselves force to rely on their wits - and their courageous dog - to help them conquer their fears and survive. Adventure, starring Jeri Ryan, John Paul Ruttan and Ella Ballentine.(n)

Animated adventure based on Waldemar Bonsels' children's book, with the voices of Coco Jack Gillies and Kodi Smit-McPhee.(n)

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Outsider Red does not fit in among his island community, but he is the only one to smell a rat when a fleet of green pigs pitch up. Animation, with the voice of Jason Sudeikis.(n)

programme.title: Miss Peregrine's Home For Peculiar Children
programme.desc: A misfit teen discovers an island orphanage that's home to children with very special gifts, but the forces of darkness are soon snapping at his heels. Tim Burton's adaptation of the cult Ransom Riggs novel, starring Asa Butterfield, Eva Green and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Throne of Elves
programme.desc: In the mythical realm of Altera, young hero Lambert is drawn into a bitter conflict between elf princess Liya and her malevolent rival, Elena. Epic animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Ashley Boettcher and GK Bowes.(n)

programme.title: The Great Gilly Hopkins
programme.desc: A feisty foster kid comes up with an outlandish scheme to be reunited with her birth mum. Coming-of-age drama, starring Kathy Bates, Glenn Close and Sophie Nelisse.(n)

programme.title: Miss Peregrine's Home For Peculiar Children
programme.desc: A misfit teen discovers an island orphanage that's home to children with very special gifts, but the forces of darkness are soon snapping at his heels. Tim Burton's adaptation of the cult Ransom Riggs novel, starring Asa Butterfield, Eva Green and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Lassie
programme.desc: Bankruptcy forces the Carraclough family to sell their devoted pet to a mean-spirited duke and his wife. But, when the well-to-do couple move away, Lassie pines for her first home and decides to track down her former owners. Family adventure, starring Peter O'Toole, Samantha Morton, John Lynch, Peter Dinklage, Steve Pemberton and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur: Sky Movies Special
programme.desc: Sky Movies takes a special look at Pixar's animated prehistoric adventure.(n)

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and company try to take Broadway by storm with their college show, setting the stage for a host of misadventures as they yearn for stardom in the Big Apple and set out to raise the money to finance their production. Comedy, performed by Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with appearances by Liza Minnelli, Art Carney, Dabney Coleman, Gregory Hines, Joan Rivers, Brooke Shields, Linda Lavin and Elliott Gould.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
programme.desc: Homer unwittingly pollutes Lake Springfield, so the US government decides to isolate the city underneath a giant dome. The Simpsons manage to escape and plan to start a new life in Alaska - but learn Springfield is about to be destroyed, and return to save their friends. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright and Yeardley Smith.(n)

programme.title: A Warrior's Tail
programme.desc: A boy escapes when his village comes under attack by a pack of hyenas, and goes to get help. He meets a magical white wolf, who leads him on a journey in search of a magician who can help them find a powerful warrior - but many danger's lie between them and the sorcerer's mountain home. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Milla Jovovich, Whoopi Goldberg and Sharon Stone.(n)

programme.title: Cars 3: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at Pixar's latest animated adventure, featuring the voices of Owen Wilson and Armie Hammer.(n)

programme.title: Snoopy and Charlie Brown: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: The long-suffering youngster hopes his lifelong run of bad luck will come to an end when he develops a crush on a new schoolfriend. His beloved dog has more important things to worry about, as he dreams of taking to the skies in his airborne kennel. Animated comedy, with the voices of Noah Schnapp and Bill Melendez.(n)

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: An intrepid treasure-hunter follows a series of ingenious clues in a perilous quest to track down a war chest hidden by America's founding fathers generations before. He has to contend with determined rivals in the shape of a treacherous associate and the FBI. Action adventure, starring Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Sean Bean and Justin Bartha.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
programme.desc: Homer unwittingly pollutes Lake Springfield, so the US government decides to isolate the city underneath a giant dome. The Simpsons manage to escape and plan to start a new life in Alaska - but learn Springfield is about to be destroyed, and return to save their friends. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright and Yeardley Smith.(n)

programme.title: A Warrior's Tail
programme.desc: A boy escapes when his village comes under attack by a pack of hyenas, and goes to get help. He meets a magical white wolf, who leads him on a journey in search of a magician who can help them find a powerful warrior - but many danger's lie between them and the sorcerer's mountain home. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Milla Jovovich, Whoopi Goldberg and Sharon Stone.(n)

programme.title: Snoopy and Charlie Brown: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: The long-suffering youngster hopes his lifelong run of bad luck will come to an end when he develops a crush on a new schoolfriend. His beloved dog has more important things to worry about, as he dreams of taking to the skies in his airborne kennel. Animated comedy, with the voices of Noah Schnapp and Bill Melendez.(n)

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: An intrepid treasure-hunter follows a series of ingenious clues in a perilous quest to track down a war chest hidden by America's founding fathers generations before. He has to contend with determined rivals in the shape of a treacherous associate and the FBI. Action adventure, starring Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Sean Bean and Justin Bartha.(n)

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A teenager from Boston moves to a small conservative town, and discovers the council and a preacher have enforced a ban on loud music and dancing. He openly defies the harsh rules, revitalising the local youth and winning the heart of the reverend's daughter. Musical remake, with Kenny Wormald, Julianne Hough and Dennis Quaid.(n)

programme.title: Cars 3: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at Pixar's latest animated adventure, featuring the voices of Owen Wilson and Armie Hammer.(n)

programme.title: Moana
programme.desc: To save her island home from a terrible curse, a brave Polynesian teenager must set sail and journey into the great blue yonder. Disney animation, with the voices of Dwayne Johnson, Auli'i Cravalho, Rachel House and Temuera Morrison.(n)

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: During the 1980s, a chameleonic US agent faces one of the most dangerous assignments of his life when he infiltrates the intricate criminal network of drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. Drama, starring Bryan Cranston, John Leguizamo and Diane Kruger.(n)

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Premiere. Animated adventure about a world where storks now deliver everything but babies, until an office mishap that is. With the voices of Andy Samberg, Kelsey Grammer and Katie Crown.(n)

programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the sci-fi action sequel, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.desc: Premiere. An ex-con battles to protect his estranged daughter from the cronies of her cartel member ex. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Erin Moriarty and Diego Luna.(n)

programme.desc: Award winning animated Disney short that brings to life the constant internal struggle between head and heart.(n)

programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams.(n)

programme.title: Alleycats
programme.desc: Premiere. A bicycle courier believes he has witnessed a murder, and flees for his life. However, he resolves later to uncover the truth of what he saw and investigates further, leading him into a dangerous world of political corruption and illegal bike racing. Action thriller, starring Josh Whitehouse, Eleanor Tomlinson and John Hannah.(n)

programme.title: After Love
programme.desc: Premiere. After 15 years of marriage, a couple with two children prepare to divorce. However, as the husband needs to find a new place to live, they have to cohabit, and figure out how to share their belongings. Drama, starring Berenice Bejo and Cedric Kahn.(n)

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the sci-fi action sequel, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: Adult Beginners
programme.desc: Premiere. An entrepreneur on the brink of success instead loses everything when the product he launches is a failure, prompting his friends to turn their backs on him. He retreats to the safety of his sister's home, where he is allowed to stay on the condition he helps look after her three-year-old son. Despite his haphazard attitude to childcare, he forms a close relationship with his nephew. Comedy drama, starring Nick Kroll, Rose Byrne and Bobby Cannavale.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Jedi Knights Obi-Wan Kenobi and Qui-Gon Jinn are instructed to protect Queen Amidala when her planet is invaded. Escorting her away from danger, they meet gifted youngster Anakin Skywalker, who seems ideally suited to join the pair's order - but is unaware of just how powerful he could become. Sci-fi prequel, starring Liam Neeson, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman and Ray Park.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
programme.desc: Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and apprentice Anakin Skywalker are sent to protect Senator Padme Amidala from an assassin. However, as galactic civil war threatens to erupt, the pair are forced to split their efforts, leading Anakin into an ill-advised romance and the beginnings of a journey toward the dark side. George Lucas's second prequel to the original sci-fi trilogy, starring Ewan McGregor, Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman and Christopher Lee.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: Troubled Anakin Skywalker finds himself seduced by the dark side of the Force and is tempted into betraying his fellow Jedi Knights as conflict erupts across countless planets and the forces of evil prepare to seize control of the galaxy. The final instalment of the sci-fi prequel trilogy, with Hayden Christensen, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman, Samuel L Jackson, Ian McDiarmid and Christopher Lee.(n)

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: The presidential election is approaching, but it remains to be seen whether anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan can survive the night. Action horror, with Frank Grillo, Mykelti Williamson and Elizabeth Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: Rupture
programme.desc: A divorced single mother is kidnapped and kept for experimentation by a group of sinister scientists. Sci-fi horror-thriller, starring Noomi Rapace, Peter Stormare and Kerry Bishe.(n)

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: A group of children who escaped from an isolated community at the centre of a mysterious labyrinth find themselves in a desolate wasteland. As they seek the truth about the organisation that imprisoned them, they face a series of terrible dangers. Sci-fi adventure based on the second of James Dashner's series of novels, starring Dylan O'Brien and Kaya Scodelario.(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two children are sent by their parents to spend a week at their grandparents' remote farm. They are confused by the old couple's strange house rules, but as they investigate, they discover something disturbing is going on - and that they may not be returning home alive. Horror, starring Olivia DeJonge and Ed Oxenbould.(n)

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: The presidential election is approaching, but it remains to be seen whether anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan can survive the night. Action horror, with Frank Grillo, Mykelti Williamson and Elizabeth Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: Downhill
programme.desc: A cyclist and his girlfriend are hunted by mysterious strangers in rural Chile after being subjected to a strange virus. Horror, starring Bryce Draper, Natalie Burn and Ariel Levy.(n)

programme.title: Rupture
programme.desc: A divorced single mother is kidnapped and kept for experimentation by a group of sinister scientists. Sci-fi horror-thriller, starring Noomi Rapace, Peter Stormare and Kerry Bishe.(n)

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: A teacher is driven to the brink of despair on the last day of term by his abusive and apathetic students. He finally snaps, and later that night, resorts to kidnapping one of the worst troublemakers in his class and trying to force him to learn - at gunpoint if need be. Thriller, starring Robert Hands and Evan Bendall.(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future Part III
programme.desc: Time-travelling teenager Marty McFly is transported back to the days of the Wild West, where he strives to save his eccentric scientist friend Doc Brown from death at the hands of a villainous gunslinger. Final instalment in the sci-fi comedy trilogy, starring Michael J Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen and Thomas F Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Sunshine
programme.desc: Fifty years in the future, Earth faces extinction, so a spacecraft sets out to reignite the sun with an experimental nuclear device. The crew intercepts a message from a previous ship, which disappeared - but the unexpected contact sets off a dangerous chain of events. Danny Boyle's sci-fi thriller, starring Cillian Murphy, Chris Evans, Michelle Yeoh and Rose Byrne.(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: A sideshow performer is taken in by a scientist, who seeks his help in performing experiments to create life, and hopefully uncover the secrets of immortality. The plan goes dangerously out of control, and it falls to the devoted assistant to save his master from his dark obsessions and his monstrous creation. Gothic horror, starring James McAvoy and Daniel Radcliffe.(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A stormtrooper fighting for an evil regime turns against his masters. He joins forces with a desert scavenger, and together they are drawn into the search for legendary war hero Luke Skywalker, who disappeared years previously. Meanwhile, a terrible weapon is about to be unleashed, that will allow the forces of evil to dominate the galaxy once again. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Harrison Ford and Adam Driver.(n)

programme.desc: Horror sequel, starring Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson. Paranormal investigators battle sinister supernatural forces in London.(n)

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: Michel Gondry's film is a fascinating melange of romance, fantasy and illusion, co-scripted with Charlie Kaufman. Joel Barish and Clementine Kruczynski were once madly in love, but their affair has gone stale. And when they meet again by chance, she doesn't just blank him, she genuinely doesn't know him. Then Joel finds out the truth. Using a new and highly experimental technology, she is having her memories of him erased from her brain. In revenge, he's determined to undergo the same process but, as dodgy scientist Dr Howard Mierzwiak (Tom Wilkinson) begins the procedure, Joel changes his mind. Can he hang on to enough memories to win Clementine back?(n)

programme.title: The Parent Trap
programme.desc: Re-make of a classic Disney comedy about twin girls who play matchmaker to their estranged parents(n)

programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: An anthropology student stumbles into a job as a nanny with an upper-crust New York family, and decides to observe the behaviour of this strange 'tribe'(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Diary of a Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: A woman has to learn how to love and trust men all over again in this comedy drama. Helen McCarter (Kimberly Elise) would seem to have it all -- she's been married for 18 years to Charles (Steve Harris), and over the course of their time together, he's become one of Atlanta's most successful attorneys. But despite wealth and prestige, things are not as they should be at the McCarter home, and on their anniversary, Charles drops a bombshell on Helen -- he's divorcing her for another woman. Escorted out of the house with nowhere to go, Helen moves in with her grandmother Madea (Tyler Perry), a sassy woman with no shortage of opinions and a gun that she's not afraid to use. As Madea helps Helen get back on her feet emotionally, the divorcée makes the acquaintance of Orlando (Shemar Moore), a handsome man who is obviously attracted to her. But after her experiences with Charles, Helen isn't sure if she's ready to trust a man again. Diary of a Mad Black Woman was adapted from the popular stage play by Tyler Perry, who also plays several roles in the film, most prominently Madea; it marked the first feature-film credit for successful music video director Darren R. Grant(n)

programme.desc: He is a phantom -- a wraith. He is a mysterious, otherworldly stranger. An evil force took his life. Now an unearthly power has brought him back. He has a destiny to fulfil, a woman's love to reclaim, and he's determined to wage a vendetta against the young punks who put him in this situation in the first place. This supernatural tale pits an enigmatic avenger against a bizarre and brutal band of marauders who have been wreaking havoc on a small desert town. But time soon runs out for The Wraith to reclaim his past and his future as he is pitted against his enemies in this action thriller. With Charlie Sheen, Randy Quaid, Sherilynn Fenn(n)

programme.title: Sleeping With Other People
programme.desc: Lainey (Alison Brie) and Jake (Jason Sudeikis) lost their virginities to each other in college, and they meet again, years later, when they attend the same meeting for sex addiction. Both of their love lives are disasters, and after rekindling their friendship, they vow to keep their relationship platonic so they can help each other with their problems: Jake is a womanizer who can't commit, while Lainey hasn't gotten over a married doctor (Adam Scott) she's been having an affair with. In time, Jake falls for a high-powered businesswoman (Amanda Peet) who buys his start-up company, while Lainey starts dating a financier (Marc Blucas). Yet through it all, they feel closer to each other than to any of their actual partners. Jason Mantzoukas and Andrea Savage co-star as a married couple who are friends with Jake, and who pressure him to settle down to avoid being the weird single guy at their parties (the end credits feature a hilarious sequence in which the two of them banter about the state of their marriage). Sleeping With Other People was written and directed by Leslye Headland(n)

programme.desc: Olivier Megaton takes the helm for the third instalment in the high-octane action thriller franchise. Jason Statham returns to his role as Frank Martin, the crook's courier of choice for legally dubious goods. In this outing he is employed by a group of environmental terrorists to drive across Europe with Valentina, the kidnapped daughter of a Ukrainian government minister. To make their journey more 'interesting', the pair are fitted with bracelets which will explode if either strays too far from their car. They are, of course, also pursued by numerous brawny types intent on bringing Martin's continental jaunt to a violently abrupt conclusion(n)

programme.title: Awake
programme.desc: Jessica Alba, Hayden Christensen, and Terrence Howard star in first-time director/screenwriter Joby Harold's nerve-jangling psychological thriller about a man who experiences the frighteningly common surgical phenomenon known as "anesthetic awareness," in which those laid out on the operating table remain acutely aware of what is going on around them despite remaining completely paralyzed and unable to cry out for help. When a successful young man (Christensen) goes under the knife and realizes that the anesthesia hasn't quite done its job, the horror quickly sets in as his worried wife (Alba) waits anxiously and a terrifying drama unfolds in the operating room(n)

Transported back to medieval times, Ash (Bruce Campbell) manages to inadvertently raise the army of the undead, and must defeat them before he can return to his own time. programme.title: Bad Ass
programme.desc: A decorated Vietnam veteran becomes a local hero after standing up to a pair of skinheads on a transit bus, and he later takes the law into his own hands after the police fail to investigate the brutal murder of his best friend. When Frank Vega (Danny Trejo) returned home from fighting for his country, he should have been hailed as a hero. Instead, he drifted into the margins of society after failing to find a job and being abandoned by his high-school sweetheart. Decades later, when Frank sees a pair of skinheads harassing an elderly black man on a city bus, he knocks them both out as the incident is captured on video. An instant viral hit, the widely circulated video turns Frank into an Internet celebrity. But his fame comes at a high price when his best friend Klondike is killed and authorities sweep the murder under the rug. Meanwhile, Frank's biggest battle is yet to come. Ron Perlman and Charles S. Dutton co-star(n)

The practised charmer agrees to the task - especially since his stepsister has offered to sleep with him if he succeeds - only to find himself falling in love. Drama based on Dangerous Liaisons, with Ryan Phillippe, Reese Witherspoon, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Selma Blair.(n)

programme.title: Anna Nicole
programme.desc: Biopic of Anna Nicole Smith, charting the rise of her successful modelling career and headline-grabbing marriage to an elderly billionaire. Following her husband's death, she is consumed by alcoholism and drug addiction as she desperately tries to maintain the celebrity status she has acquired. Biopic of Anna Nicole Smith, starring Agnes Bruckner and Martin Landau.(n)

After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series(n)

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: Two recent college graduates try to hack it in the real world. As the couple grapple with the pangs of adulthood, he learns that his writing internship will no longer lead to a full-time gig, while she is laid off from her first post-grad position(n)

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: High school oddball Ducky idolises his best friend Andie but she's smitten with rich boy Blane who might be interested - if she wasn't so poor(n)

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
programme.desc: New York City subway dispatcher Walter Garber's ordinary day is thrown into chaos by an audacious crime: the hijacking of a subway train. Ryder is the criminal mastermind who, as leader of a highly-armed gang of four, threatens to execute the train's passengers unless a large ransom is paid within one hour. As the tension mounts beneath his feet, Garber employs his vast knowledge of the subway system in a battle to outwit Ryder and save the hostages. But there's one riddle Garber can't solve: even if the thieves get the money, how can they possibly escape?(n)

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: After the little white lies of Romy and Michele's High School Reunion (1997), director David Mirkin focuses on scheming of a different sort in Heartbreakers. Sigourney Weaver and Jennifer Love Hewitt play Max and Page Conners, a mother and daughter who share everything with each other: relationship advice, hair and makeup hints, and the money they win in costly divorce settlements with rich men. When the film opens, the Conners are putting the finishing touches on conning Dean (Ray Liotta), an auto-body shop owner. When the dust from that scam clears, Page announces she's ready to move away from her mother and set up shop on her own -- but in order to clear an outstanding debt, Max insists they bankrupt one more bachelor together. They settle upon phlegmatic Palm Springs widower William B. Tensy (Gene Hackman), a chain smoker with a heart of gold and a similarly bountiful bank account. Only two things stand in their way: Tensy's Teutonic caretaker Miss Madress (Nora Dunn) and beachfront bartender Jack (Jason Lee), a wry stargazer with whom Page becomes unexpectedly smitten. Heartbreakers is the third collaboration from writers Steven Mazur and Paul Guy, whose previous screwball comedy was 1997's international hit, Liar Liar(n)

programme.desc: Dopey Mike is a liability for his elder brother, an aspiring politician. So he's palmed off on an aide who has orders to keep him out of trouble, but it doesn't take long for Mike to hit the headlines(n)

programme.desc: Tom Hanks reprises his role as Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon in director Ron Howard and screenwriter David Koepp's adaptation of author Dan Brown's bestselling novel Inferno, which finds Langdon using Dante's The Divine Comedy as a tool in the race to prevent a devastating global pandemic(n)

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: After the little white lies of Romy and Michele's High School Reunion (1997), director David Mirkin focuses on scheming of a different sort in Heartbreakers. Sigourney Weaver and Jennifer Love Hewitt play Max and Page Conners, a mother and daughter who share everything with each other: relationship advice, hair and makeup hints, and the money they win in costly divorce settlements with rich men. When the film opens, the Conners are putting the finishing touches on conning Dean (Ray Liotta), an auto-body shop owner. When the dust from that scam clears, Page announces she's ready to move away from her mother and set up shop on her own -- but in order to clear an outstanding debt, Max insists they bankrupt one more bachelor together. They settle upon phlegmatic Palm Springs widower William B. Tensy (Gene Hackman), a chain smoker with a heart of gold and a similarly bountiful bank account. Only two things stand in their way: Tensy's Teutonic caretaker Miss Madress (Nora Dunn) and beachfront bartender Jack (Jason Lee), a wry stargazer with whom Page becomes unexpectedly smitten. Heartbreakers is the third collaboration from writers Steven Mazur and Paul Guy, whose previous screwball comedy was 1997's international hit, Liar Liar(n)

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
programme.desc: New York City subway dispatcher Walter Garber's ordinary day is thrown into chaos by an audacious crime: the hijacking of a subway train. Ryder is the criminal mastermind who, as leader of a highly-armed gang of four, threatens to execute the train's passengers unless a large ransom is paid within one hour. As the tension mounts beneath his feet, Garber employs his vast knowledge of the subway system in a battle to outwit Ryder and save the hostages. But there's one riddle Garber can't solve: even if the thieves get the money, how can they possibly escape?(n)

programme.title: The Family Stone
programme.desc: Christmas doesn't prove very merry to a stuffy New York City career woman attending a holiday reunion of her fiancé's offbeat clan(n)

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this comedy drama - set during World War II - tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series(n)

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: Two recent college graduates try to hack it in the real world. As the couple grapple with the pangs of adulthood, he learns that his writing internship will no longer lead to a full-time gig, while she is laid off from her first post-grad position(n)

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: High school oddball Ducky idolises his best friend Andie but she's smitten with rich boy Blane who might be interested - if she wasn't so poor(n)

programme.desc: Dopey Mike is a liability for his elder brother, an aspiring politician. So he's palmed off on an aide who has orders to keep him out of trouble, but it doesn't take long for Mike to hit the headlines(n)

programme.title: Turistas
programme.desc: John Stockwell's thriller Turistas begins when vacationers end up stranded in a little Brazilian village after a bus accident wipes out their transportation. Although many in the group are experienced when it comes to unusual travel destinations, none of them are able to get a handle on this strange village. They soon come to realize that they are stranded somewhere with something much more dangerous than they could have imagined. Josh Duhamel, Melissa George, and Olivia Wilde co-star(n)

programme.title: When the Bough Breaks
programme.desc: A young woman agrees to be the surrogate for a married couple, but she soon becomes infatuated with the household's father-to-be in this blend of horror and erotic drama. Although she initially seems stable and normal during an introduction with would-be parents John (Morris Chestnut) and Laura (Regina Hall), Anna (Jaz Sinclair) grows fixated on John and is willing to do whatever it takes to seduce him. Directed by Jon Cassar(n)

programme.desc: The life and career of comedian Robert Klein are the focus of this documentary, which includes interviews with Jerry Seinfeld, Jon Stewart, Richard Lewis and more(n)

programme.desc: Advice columnist Dan Burns struggles with his own three kids, but life gets even more complicated when he falls for his brother's new love(n)

programme.title: Because I Said So
programme.desc: Diane Keaton and Mandy Moore star in this romcom from director Michael Lehmann. Daphne Wilder is worried about her youngest daughter, Milly. Not only is she still unwed, but, with a string of not even remotely successful love affairs behind her, it's starting to look as though she'll stay that way. So what's a mother to do? Well, what about seeking out and vetting potential suitors for her daughter via the internet? And thus Daphne sets in train the inevitable series of misunderstandings that may or may not lead to Milly getting together with the man who looks most likely to be her Mr Right, musician Johnny; unless, of course, he turns out to be architect Jason. Also starring Piper Perabo and Lauren Graham(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: A comedy about a soldier who awakens in a world filled with dumb people after becoming involved in a futuristic experiment(n)

programme.desc: A former CIA operative takes on drug dealers and "The Man" to avenge his brother's murder and clean up the streets in this fun and funky spoof of 1970s blaxploitation movies. Michael Jai White cowrote and stars. Kym Whitley, Tommy Davidson, Kevin Chapman, Byron Minns, Salli Richardson-Whitfield. Directed by Scott Sanders(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A spy who tries to keep his profession a secret from his spouse fights international bad guys while attempting to win his wife back from a salesman who is trying to steal her away(n)

programme.title: The Firm
programme.desc: Sydney Pollack's film, based on John Grisham's bestseller, stars Tom Cruise as Mitch McDeere, a young lawyer who joins a small but prestigious law firm, only to find out that most of their clients are on the wrong side of the law. The company is helping to launder mob money, get clients off charges and even murder partners who threaten to blow their cover. But when the FBI, in the shape of Wayne Tarrance, come calling to get McDeere's help gathering evidence on his colleagues, he is caught between a rock and a hard place, juggling the risk to his life and his liberty. With Jeanne Tripplehorn, Gene Hackman and Oscar-nominated Holly Hunter(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.desc: Religious drama based on a true story about a young girl who is miraculously cured of a digestive disorder following a serious accident(n)

programme.title: Rio, I Love You
programme.desc: Another installment of the "Cities of Love" series, this anthology film depicts romantic encounters in different neighborhoods of Rio de Janeiro. In all, 10 shorts are woven together to spin a tale of love in "the Marvelous City."(n)

programme.title: 2016 Oscar Nominated Live Action Short Films
programme.desc: A compilation of live-action short films nominated for Academy Awards(n)

programme.title: The Raven
programme.desc: John Cusack stars in James McTeigue's period thriller. It's 1849 and times are bad for Gothic horror writer Edgar Allan Poe - his glory days are far behind him and he can't even scrape together the money for the alcohol he craves. Then a killer begins terrorising Baltimore with a series of grisly slayings based on Poe's celebrated stories and the author finds himself in the spotlight. Once cleared of involvement in the case, Poe is invited to help Detective Fields track down the murderer. But things take on a greater urgency when Poe's beloved Emily Hamilton is kidnapped and he's sent a note by the killer telling Poe that he must publish a new story... Also starring Brendan Gleeson(n)

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Both laughs and thrills are on the masthead in this comedy drama about a would-be reporter written and directed by Woody Allen. Sondra Pransky (Scarlett Johansson) is an American journalism student who travels to England to visit friends. While in London, she attends a magic show where magician Sid "Splendini" Waterman (Woody Allen) brings her on-stage as part of a trick in which he makes her disappear. However, while waiting to be "de-materialized," she's visited by the ghost of a murdered reporter (Ian McShane), who passes along the scoop of the decade. The spirit claims that Peter Lyman (Hugh Jackman), the wealthy and handsome son of a well-known aristocrat, is leading a double life as "the Tarot Card Killer," a serial murderer who has been terrifying the nation and eluding police. With the magician's help, Jane begins investigating the story and is able to piece together some incriminating evidence against Lyman. However, the more she learns, the more dangerous her investigation becomes -- especially when she falls into a romance with the suspected killer. Scoop was Woody Allen's second consecutive film with leading lady Scarlett Johansson, after the critically acclaimed Match Point; it was also Allen's second feature to be shot in Great Britain(n)

programme.title: Solitary Man
programme.desc: Unscrupulous New York businessman Ben Kalmen attempts to pick up the pieces after a series of poor decisions leaves his life in ruins. Now, if he can just keep his salacious impulses in check, he may be back on the road to success. But when Ben takes his new girlfriend's college-bound daughter to look at a prospective school, everything starts to fall apart(n)

programme.title: Julieta
programme.desc: Middle-aged Julieta (Emma Suarez) learns via a chance meeting with an acquaintance that her long-lost daughter has resurfaced in Madrid. This revelation forces her to reflect on her checkered past, as she recalls the moments of pain that defined her current life. This drama was directed by Spanish master Pedro Almodóvar, and was adapted from three short stories by acclaimed author Alice Munro(n)

programme.title: Lovely & Amazing
programme.desc: Brenda Blethyn plays a mother to grown up daughters Catherine Keener, an 'artist', and Emily Mortimer, an actress plus Raven Goodwin, who is adopted and just eight. Nicole Holofcener celebrates their lives, loves and misfortunes in this perceptive, sometimes funny, sometimes tragic gem of a film(n)

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: A starry-eyed would-be star discovers just how far the notion that "there's no such thing as bad publicity" can go in this screen adaptation of the hit Broadway musical +Chicago, originally directed and choreographed by Bob Fosse. In the mid-'20s, Roxie Hart (Renee Zellweger) is a small-time chorus dancer married to a well-meaning dunderhead named Amos (John C. Reilly). Roxie is having an affair on the side with Fred Casley (Dominic West), a smooth talker who insists he can make her a star. However, Fred strings Roxie along a bit too far for his own good, and when she realizes that his promises are empty, she becomes enraged and murders Fred in cold blood. Roxie soon finds herself behind bars alongside Velma Kelly (Catherine Zeta-Jones), a sexy vaudeville star who used to perform with her sister until Velma discovered that her sister had been sleeping with her husband. Velma shot them both dead, and, after scheming prison matron "Mama" Morton hooks Velma up with hotshot lawyer Billy Flynn (Richard Gere), Velma becomes the new Queen of the scandal sheets. Roxie is just shrewd enough to realize that her poor fortune could also bring her fame, so she convinces Amos to also hire Flynn. Soon Flynn is splashing Roxie's story -- or, more accurately, a highly melodramatic revision of Roxie's story -- all over the gutter press, and Roxy and Velma are soon battling neck-to-neck over who can win greater fame through the headlines. A project that had been moving from studio to studio since the musical opened on Broadway in 1973, Chicago also features guest appearances by Lucy Liu and Christine Baranski(n)

programme.title: Miles Ahead
programme.desc: This free-form biopic of jazz musician Miles Davis depicts his attempts at a career comeback following a period of listlessness in the '70s, his relationship with a journalist who wants to profile him and his troubled marriage to a former dancer(n)

programme.title: Gods and Monsters
programme.desc: Offbeat biography about the life of eccentric British filmmaker James Whale, who directed the original Frankenstein. Ian McKellen and Lynn Redgrave received Oscar nominations for their performances(n)

programme.title: Julieta
programme.desc: Middle-aged Julieta (Emma Suarez) learns via a chance meeting with an acquaintance that her long-lost daughter has resurfaced in Madrid. This revelation forces her to reflect on her checkered past, as she recalls the moments of pain that defined her current life. This drama was directed by Spanish master Pedro Almodóvar, and was adapted from three short stories by acclaimed author Alice Munro(n)

programme.title: The Young Victoria
programme.desc: Queen Victoria deals with turbulent 19th-century politics while coping with societal pressure to marry someone other than her true love, Prince Albert(n)

programme.title: Miles Ahead
programme.desc: This free-form biopic of jazz musician Miles Davis depicts his attempts at a career comeback following a period of listlessness in the '70s, his relationship with a journalist who wants to profile him and his troubled marriage to a former dancer(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: The Reckoning. An attempt to rescue Claire from Black Jack Randall is mounted by Jamie and the Highlanders(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.sub-title: By the Pricking of My Thumbs
programme.desc: By the Pricking of My Thumbs. With the arrival of the Duke of Sandringham, Jamie hopes the price on his head will be lifted, while Claire cares for an abandoned child(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: A washed-up American actor experiences culture shock while filming a whiskey commercial in Tokyo, but finds solace in his connection with a married 20-something whose successful photographer husband is in the city on an assignment. As the unlikely pair explores Tokyo, they begin to wonder if their sudden friendship might be growing into something more(n)

programme.title: The Closer You Get
programme.desc: The Full Monty production team scores again in this warm comedy about the dating game going transatlantic. The menfolk of a sleepy Irish village place an ad in a Miami newspaper publicising their interest in matrimony with American ladies. The men prepare a party but the local lasses plot to sabotage their plans(n)

programme.title: Solitary Man
programme.desc: Unscrupulous New York businessman Ben Kalmen attempts to pick up the pieces after a series of poor decisions leaves his life in ruins. Now, if he can just keep his salacious impulses in check, he may be back on the road to success. But when Ben takes his new girlfriend's college-bound daughter to look at a prospective school, everything starts to fall apart(n)

programme.title: Tamara Drewe
programme.desc: Tamara Drewe returns to the sleepy Dorset village where she grew up to sell her mother's house. Once the big-nosed girl next door, she has had a nose job and is a successful journalist in London. Her old flame Andy is still working for philandering novelist Nicholas Hardiment and his long-suffering wife and, when Tamara begins a relationship with rock drummer Ben Sergeant, there begins a three-way contest for her affections, made more complicated by the dreams of 15-year-old Jody, who wants to grow up and get away from the village just like Tamara(n)

programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross
programme.desc: Al Pacino and Alec Baldwin star in the award-winning drama depicting two days in the lives of real estate men competing in a sales contest where the losers will be fired(n)

programme.title: Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
programme.desc: After being dumped by his conniving girlfriend, nerdy Nick meets sassy Norah on a crazy night out in the Big Apple. As the two bond over their love of music, their respective exes try to spoil the moment. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Searching for Sugar Man
programme.desc: Two South African music lovers uncover a shocking secret while investigating the fate of obscure U.S. rocker Sixto Diaz Rodriguez, whose debut album became a surprise hit in their home country(n)

programme.title: The Anniversary Party
programme.desc: In this Dogma 95-inspired first feature for acclaimed performers Jennifer Jason Leigh and Alan Cumming, the two star as Joe and Sally Therrian, a couple who have recently reconciled after a yearlong separation, and who decide to throw a sixth anniversary party in their honor. They invite a bevy of Hollywood types, including Skye Davidson (Gwyneth Paltrow), a young, beautiful, Ecstasy-pushing actress appointed to play a character based on Sally in the new feature film based on Joe's successful novel. Also featured are Cal and Sophia Gold (played by real-life marrieds Kevin Kline and Phoebe Cates), the former a co-star of Sally's and the latter her best friend who has given up the business to raise a family; Mac (John C. Reilly), the director of the new film and his actress wife Clair (Jane Adams), who has continued working after the recent birth of their child; Judy and Jerry Adams (Parker Posey and John Benjamin Hickey), the Therrians' managers; and Gina (Jennifer Beals), Joe's ex-girlfriend, who is often regarded as his first big love. Things are complicated when their contentious neighbors (Mina Badie and Denis O'Hare) make an appearance, and a mystery gift causes the event to unravel over the course of one long evening. The film was also written by Cumming and Leigh, another first for both actors(n)

programme.title: Wicker Park
programme.desc: Directed by Paul McGuigan, Wicker Park follows Chicago businessman Matthew's (Josh Hartnett) return to Windy City life after having dedicated two years of his life to mourning his long lost love Lisa (Diane Kruger), who'd mysteriously vanished from his life. Things are finally looking up again for Matthew; his career is in full swing, and he's thinking of becoming engaged -- that is, until he thinks he's spotted his former lover in a restaurant. Almost immediately, Matthew puts the brakes on his marriage plans and his career in order to conduct an exhaustive search for his old flame. Obsessed, he barely notices the psychologically devastating trap his quest is leading him into -- a danger that only grows when he meets an enigmatic stranger (Rose Byrne). Wicker Park features Matthew Lillard and Jessica Paré in supporting roles(n)

programme.title: The Eagle Huntress
programme.desc: A 13-year-old Mongolian girl named Aisholpan Nurgaiv strives to become the first female in her culture to learn to hunt alongside a trained eagle. As she prepares for an annual eagle-hunting competition, she must also deal with the disapproval of several tribal elders. Directed by Otto Bell(n)

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Chalk 'n' cheese sisters Cameron Diaz and Toni Collette fall out over a man. Can long-lost gran Shirley MacLaine bring them back together? Comedy drama. Sexual references(n)

programme.title: Year One
programme.desc: Jack Black and Michael Cera headline Harold Ramis' Stone Age comedy about a pair of lazy hunter-gatherers who embark on a wild journey through the ancient world after being banished from their primitive village(n)

programme.title: Nine Months
programme.desc: Hugh Grant plays child psychiatrist Samuel Faulkner who, ironically, can't stand children. So when long-standing girlfriend Rebecca Taylor announces she's pregnant, he's less than thrilled and eventually, fed-up with his moaning, she moves out to stay with friends Marty and Gail Dwyer. This being a Chris Columbus film, it all ends happily but not without a lot of fun along the way, particularly from Robin Williams as Russian obstetrician Dr Kosevich who is not just prone to malapropisms, but hasn't actually delivered a baby before(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: Kevin James cowrote and stars in this farce about a mild-mannered security guard at a New Jersey mall who has to save the day when a gang of thieves try to pull a big heist(n)

programme.title: Major League
programme.desc: Baseball comedy following a team of bungling amateurs and over-the-hill athletes through an unexpected winning streak. When a former chorus girl inherits the ownership of the Cleveland Indians from her deceased husband, she deliberately puts together a bad team in an attempt to relocate them to Miami. But, against all odds, the team begins winning matches. A sequel followed in 1994(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: It's 1981 and the last day at a Maine summer camp, where both the counselors and the campers are looking for a good time.This hilarious spoof of the summer-camp films of the '70s and '80s features Janeane Garofalo as the chief counselor and David Hyde Pierce as the object of her affection. Written by Michael Showalter and David Wain of the sketch comedy The State. Paul Rudd, Molly Shannon, Amy Poehler, Christopher Meloni(n)

programme.title: Grandma's Boy
programme.desc: After his flatmate spends the rent money on Filipino hookers, Alex is forced to stay with his Grandma and her two housemates(n)

programme.title: Safe Men
programme.desc: Two inept young men are recruited as safecrackers by a Jewish gangster who wants them to steal a Stanley Cup from the safe of 'Good Stuff Leo' - another Jewish gangster - so he can present the prize to his son as a bar mitzvah present. Sam Rockwell, Steve Zahn, Paul Giamatti, Harvey Fierstein, Christina Kirk, Michael Lerner(n)

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: Method Man and Kevin Hart star as the owners of an airline that caters to a black clientele in this outrageously funny takeoff on "Airplane!" Look for a top-flight performance by Snoop Dogg as a pilot who likes to get high both on and off the ground. Mo'Nique costars as a frisky security official with a penchant for strip-searching handsome travelers; and NBA star Karl Malone has a cameo as himself. Tom Arnold, Arielle Kebbel, Godfrey(n)

programme.title: Jasper Redd: Jazz Talk
programme.desc: Jasper Redd performs a rhythmic comedy routine at the Folly Theater in Kansas City(n)

programme.title: PCU
programme.desc: Actor Hart Bochner turns director in the satirical Animal House update P.C.U.. Per the title, the film takes place on the campus of a University where, thanks to militant dean Jessica Walter, Political Correctness has reached ridiculous proportions. A group of dorm-room cutups, wallowing in their uncorrectness, declares war on the uptight student activists who call the shots. Saturday Night Live's David Spade is among the leading players; while he's funnier here than in his costarring stints in Chris Farley's films, he doesn't have much to work with. The subject matter covered in P.C.U. has already been tackled, with far funnier results, on Bill Maher's cable-TV weekly Politically Incorrect(n)

programme.title: Kissing a Fool
programme.desc: Jay is a novelist, hopelessly in love with his ex-girlfriend. Max is a womanizing sportscaster. When Jay introduces Max to his publisher Sam, they become engaged in just 14 days. Max worries about settling down, and Jay and Sam become closer while working on Jay's book together(n)

programme.title: Monkeybone
programme.desc: Brendan Fraser stars in this imaginative fantasy-comedy about a cartoonist who is seriously injured in an accident and slips into a coma. In his dream state, he vies with his cartoon creation, Monkeybone, for control of his body. John Turturro provides the voice of Monkeybone. Bridget Fonda, Chris Kattan, Giancarlo Esposito, Rose McGowan, Whoopi Goldberg, Megan Mullally(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mum's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others(n)

programme.title: I.Q.
programme.desc: Lighthearted romance about the adventures of Albert Einstein's niece, a confident young woman determined to find a man as intelligent as her famous uncle. Instead, she finds herself pursued by an amorous mechanic who forms an unlikely partnership with Einstein himself. While she flirts with a boring academic, her uncle attempts to steer her towards Ed by passing him off as a genius - with mixed results(n)

programme.title: Under Suspicion
programme.desc: When a powerful man is accused of murder, who tells the truth -- the man, or his estranged wife? Henry Hearst (Gene Hackman), an American attorney living in Puerto Rico, is called in to speak with police detective Victor Benezet (Morgan Freeman). A few days earlier, Hearst reported finding the body of a 12-year-old girl while taking his dog for a walk; however, investigators now believe that Hearst may have had a greater involvement in the crime than he's admitting. Under intense questioning by a confident young cop named Owens (Thomas Jane) and gentler but firm interrogation from Benezet, several cracks begin to appear in Hearst's story, but he's able to persuade the police to allow him to leave long enough to take part in a fund-raising function he'd promised to attend. However, upon his return, Hearst discovers that Benezet and Owens have been questioning someone else -- his wife Chantal (Monica Bellucci), who has been on poor terms with her husband for some time. Under Suspicion was based on the novel Brainwash by John Wainwright, which was previously filmed by French director Claude Miller as Garde a vue(n)

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: Lots of laughs and a great camaraderie is the recipe for two street-wise cops that have decided to quit the force and open a bar. However, the duo's plans come to an abrupt halt when Julio, a drug dealer who nearly killed them, has made bail and is about to complete a major drug deal. This motivates the two to stick with police work and bring Julio to justice(n)

programme.title: Silver Streak
programme.desc: Farcical comedy in which a mild-mannered book publisher's train journey to Chicago goes wildly off the tracks when he stumbles on a murder plot. Hitchcock meets farce in this runaway romp which paired Gene Wilder and Richard Pryor for the first time(n)

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: Married asset manager Derek gets a beautiful new assistant, but his life becomes a living hell when her efforts to win his attention become more and more extreme(n)

programme.title: She Hate Me
programme.desc: When an executive is fired for 'blowing the whistle' on his dodgy bosses, he begins to earn a living by helping lesbian couples to start families. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A female-led reboot of the classic franchise(n)

programme.desc: Young couple Chris and Lisa Mattson are terrorised by their new neighbour, racist cop Abel Turner. Thriller(n)

programme.desc: Gruesome horror comedy about a pot-smoking teen slacker (Devon Sawa) who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand(n)

programme.title: Senseless
programme.desc: Broad comedy about a financially-insecure economics graduate who agrees to participate in a drug trial. The drug in question enhances the subject's senses, and he uses his newly-developed powers to get ahead in business. For a while, he enjoys the good life - but then the drug begins to show some unusual side effects(n)

programme.title: The Ghost and the Darkness
programme.desc: Adventure drama about the confrontation between two Europeans and a pair of lions that are obstructing the progress of a railway line in East Africa during the 1890s. When the labourers become so frightened by recurring lion attacks at their campsite that they are reluctant to continue to work, an engineer and a big-game hunter join forces in an attempt to outwit the predators(n)

programme.title: Redbelt
programme.desc: Writer-director David Mamet's riveting drama touches on the worlds of mixed martial arts, Hollywood and shady con men. Chiwetel Ejiofor gives a knock-out performance as a jujitsu instructor who gets conned into fighting in a money bout after getting backed into a financial corner. Mamet is a practitioner of jujitsu. Alice Braga, Tim Allen, Ricky Jay, Joe Mantegna. Mixed-martial-arts fighter Randy Couture costars(n)

programme.title: Cadillac Records
programme.desc: It's music from the soundtrack of many a person's life in this exceptional, fact-based look at the rise of Chess Records, led by founder Leonard Chess (Adrien Brody). The film also charts the stable of influential artists who recorded on the label, among them Etta James (played with saucy, sassy insouciance by Beyoncé Knowles), Chuck Berry (Mos Def), Muddy Waters (Jeffrey Wright), Howlin' Wolf (Eamonn Walker) and Willie Dixon (Cedric the Entertainer). Written and directed by Darnell Martin(n)

programme.title: Mindhunters
programme.desc: A group of trainee FBI profilers discover there is a killer among them. Can they identify the culprit?(n)

programme.title: The Scout
programme.desc: Comedy drama about a baseball talent scout for the New York Yankees who stumbles across a fantastic talent in the wilds of Mexico - but there's a price to pay for the boy's genius. When the scout witnesses the speed at which the boy can throw a ball, he soon realises he must sign him. But the talented chap reveals that he is psychologically disturbed(n)

programme.title: Redbelt
programme.desc: Writer-director David Mamet's riveting drama touches on the worlds of mixed martial arts, Hollywood and shady con men. programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: In this sci-fi/horror scarefest, Dr. William Weir (Sam Neill) is a scientist who has designed a spacecraft called Event Horizon which will explore the outer reaches of space past the planet Neptune; the ship employs a special transport mechanism that, in effect, creates a black hole that the ship can pass through, allowing it to travel tremendous distances in a few seconds. The Event Horizon mysteriously disappears in the midst of a mission with no trace of either the ship or its crew, but it reappears in Neptune's orbit after a seven year absence and it's sending out a distress signal. The spaceship Lewis and Clark, and Dr. Weir, are sent to investigate; the crew -- Captain Miller (Laurence Fishburne), pilot Smith (Sean Pertwee), engineer Justin (Jack Noseworthy), navigator Starck (Joely Richardson), physician D.J. (Jason Isaacs), and emergency technicians Peters (Kathleen Quinlan) and Cooper (Richard T. Jones) -- are already tired and unenthusiastic about this assignment, and somewhat confused by Weir's reports. The crew of the Lewis and Clark are convinced that Weir is not telling them something, and when they discover the Event Horizon, they find that things are not what they seem, and an evil presence has taken over the ship. Incidentally, the term "event horizon" describes the outer boundaries of a black hole(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: Grown-Ass Man. As Season 2 tips off, the Calloways have moved from the penthouse to a regal new mansion, and Cam's new contract and its serious clauses ties him tightly to owner Jimmy Flaherty, who wants to maximise Cam's time(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: A Time to Punch. Cam and M-Chuck are taken by surprise by some media fallout and a DA's scrutiny about domestic abuse, while Uncle Julius squares off with a neighbour whose dog dumps things in the driveway(n)

programme.desc: Profiling photographer Clark Little, whose work focuses on shorebreak waves(n)

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel
programme.desc: The '70s-trapped Bradys must travel to Hawaii to save the family after Carol's first husband shows up and threatens their idyllic existence. As Carol is torn between two husbands, Mike struggles to hold the family together and Alice cooks a lot of meat loaf. Shelley Long, Gary Cole, Tim Matheson, Christopher Daniel Barnes, Christine Taylor, Paul Sutera, Jennifer Elise Cox, Henriette Mantel(n)

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: Comedy sci-fi adventure in which the stars of a 1970s sci-fi show, now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions, are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the cast's heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system(n)

programme.title: One Direction: This Is Us
programme.desc: A look at the rise to fame of boy band One Direction, as well as their spectacular show at London's O2 arena(n)

programme.title: Aquamarine
programme.desc: Elizabeth Allen's teen comedy stars Sara Paxton as the titular Aquamarine, a mermaid washed ashore in a storm. She is discovered by Claire and Hailey and, able to take human form during the day and when dry, the three form a bond. The trio concoct a plan to win the heart of hunky lifeguard Raymond, to the fury of the jealous Cecilia who starts snooping around. Can Aquamarine guard her secret, will she learn about love and will she grant a wish for Hailey that will keep her and Emma friends?(n)

programme.title: The Trumpet of the Swan
programme.desc: E.B. White's classic children's novel comes to life in this animated adventure with a vocal cast featuring Jason Alexander and Mary Steenburgen. The charming story centers on the travails of a mute swan trying to find his voice with the help of a boy and the gift of a trumpet. Other voices include Carol Burnett, Reese Witherspoon and Seth Green(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: After cheating on a test to win a promotion, Fred Flintstone becomes unwittingly involved in a prehistoric embezzlement scam. Family(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prequel in which prehistoric everyman Fred Flintstone woos wealthy Wilma Slaghoople as the fledgling couple travel to glitzy Rock Vegas with friends Barney Rubble and Betty O'Shale(n)
